app_name: Pimp My Music - Tag Editor Pro
description: Try 'Pimp My Music - Free' first. The pro version has no banner ads. The most complete and feature rich Android music tag editor/music player on the market! Find missing album covers/lyrics and change artist and album names effortlessly, straight from your phone. ***Important*** From Android 4.4 Kitkat and above. Google has restricted third party apps from writing to an external SD card. This means that this app can no longer update music on an SD card on Kitkat and above. You can either move your music collection to internal storage OR root your device and change your external storage permissions. ******************************************************************************************************************************** * Fix your music library, on your phone. * Music player * LRC Karaoke style lyrics scrolling/highlighting support (LRC format must be pasted into lyrics field) (Beta) * Edit Id3 tags in MP3, OGG, FLAC, MP4, M4A, M4P, M4B, WAV, RA, RM, MPGA and WMA audio files. * Auto fetch missing album covers. * Search and save album covers/art from Google images (finds images for rare albums). * Add album covers from sdcard. * Batch tagging. * Rename/delete files from id3 tag fields. * Saves to both file and android media database. * Audio playback (not FLAC or WMA audio). * App2sd (store app on SD card) * Supports MP3 ID3v1,ID3v11, ID3v2.2, v2.3 and v2.4 transparently, saves in v2.4. * Browse by album, artist, song, genre, folders. * Search by ID3 fields. * Editable ID3 tag fields include: artist, title, album, artist album, genre, comment, track, track total, composer, lyrics, year, disc number. * Search lyrics (artist & title and from text in lyrics) * Auto fetch missing lyrics * Fix garbled tags by changing character sets. Note: * Unfortunately, Google have blocked write access to external storage from kitkat (api level 19 and above). Media files would need to be on your internal storage. Or if you root your device, you can modify the external storage write permissions. * Saves to both file id3 tag and Android music player database. * The android music player only uses 1 album cover per album. Save one file in an album and the music player will show that album cover for all the tracks in the album. * The missing album cover search selects the first result, if it is wrong you need to change it manually by clicking on the song. * Does not edit all video file formats. Any errors please submit an error report. If you would like to help fix wrong translations, please send an email.
release_text: 2.2.4 - Reverted text save changes - Added BPM (Beats per Minute) field - Minor translation fixes 2.2.3 - Thumbnails now automatically refresh after a save - List scrolling improvements. - Tags -> Filename - now available in multiple file mode - Filename -> Tags - now available in multiple file mode - Tag saving improvements - Bug fixes 2.2.2 - Improved Music Player stability

description: Search for the most jobs in one little app… SEEK now makes it even easier to find and apply for your next job, here, there or anywhere! This is the first release of our Android App. It’s new and fresh and we know it needs improvement, but please try it out and let us know what you think. Sign in with your SEEK login for seamless job searching across all your devices. ● Search more jobs than anywhere else and easily review job ads by swiping ● Shortlist interesting roles to pick up where you left off on phone, tablet or desktop ● Monitor the industry with favourite searches ● Apply faster with pre-filled application forms and resumes stored in your SEEK account ● Track the jobs you’ve already applied for Let us know your thoughts by clicking on Feedback in the app, or email us at usersupport@seek.com.au (remember to tell us what device you're using).
release_text: ● Usability improvements to search results and minor bug fixes. As always, let us know your thoughts by clicking on Feedback in the app.

description: The official Westpac Online Investing App now includes an alerts feature which allows you to receive stock Alerts straight to your Android device via push notifications. You can now set up the following alerts: • Stock price rises above or below a specified price • Stock reaches a specified traded volume • Stock ex–dividend date notice • Market sensitive announcements The Westpac Online Investing Mobile App provides you access to: • Trade shares, warrants and ETFs • View, create, rename, add and remove stocks from your Watchlists • View live quotes, announcements, charts and news • View Equities, Online Investment Loan and BT Margin Lending holdings • View live market indices and major currency exchange rates • View live balances for integrated cash accounts • Set a 4 digit PIN for quicker login Internet connection is required to use Westpac Online Investing App. Normal data charges apply.
release_text: You can now create, view, edit and delete various types of alerts from your smartphone. You can select to receive push notifications direct to your smartphone and/ or select email to your designated email address. The alerts you create on your smartphone will immediately sync with the website and vice versa.

developer: NSW Department of Attorney General and Justice
description: The Australian NSW Registry of Births Deaths & Marriages Family History App is the cornerstone of building your New South Wales family tree. Find out more about your ancestors. Where they were born, where they got married, where and when they died. Are there any secrets in your family for you to uncover? Don’t leave any relatives unfound. The Registry is the official keeper of birth, death & marriage records registered in New South Wales, Australia. Search the historical indexes for free today! If there is a record that captures your interest or completes the missing puzzle of your family tree you can purchase a birth, death or marriage certificate through the Registry’s official Family History App. Ever wanted to find out more about the first settlers, iconic Australians or historical moments of your ancestor’s? Are you related to a famous Australian? Start searching today and discover information about your family’s past. Collect certificates and create a family tree for future generations. Use the Family History app to: · Search historical indexes · Trace your family tree · Search specific birth, death or marriage records · Purchase birth, death or marriage certificates · Find specific information such as birth, marriage & burial place of your ancestors · Look up iconic Australians · Build a collection of certificates What indexes can you look up? You can search historical indexes for births deaths & marriages registered in New South Wales. Births - 100 years ago or more Deaths - 30 years ago or more Marriages - 50 years ago or more How does it work? Using the Family History App is simple. All you need to do is select the event type you wish to search, type in the name/s and year of birth, death or marriage and then select search. If you’re not sure of the exact year, you can type in a year range and the App will bring back matching results for events records in the New South Wales Registry's historical indexes. Once you have selected a specific record you can then purchase the certificate. When a selection is made you will be directed to the Registry’s secure website for the final purchase. The certificate will be posted to you. Postage is free! To find out more go to www.bdm.nsw.gov.au

Speed Adviser is a trial driver's aid designed to reduce speeding and save lives in NSW. Speed Adviser monitors your location and speed via GPS and plays an audible warning if you exceed the speed limit. Speeding is the most common contributing factor to road deaths in NSW. NEVER FORGET THE SPEED LIMIT Speed Adviser displays the speed limit for the road you are travelling on. Speed zone data has been compiled by NSW Roads and Maritime Services, Transport for NSW and Sensis. DOWNLOADING AND INSTALLATION Ensure you have a Google account and that it is linked to your phone. When you have an account, open the “Settings” app on your phone and find the “Accounts” section. If your account is not linked to the phone, tap “Add account” to add your Google account. You can install Speed Adviser using the Play Store app on your phone (called “Market” on older phones), or by accessing the Google Play website on your computer. Generally Speed Adviser will not download to your phone until it is connected to a WiFi network. To download Speed Adviser over a 3G network, go to the Play Store app on your phone and in its Settings turn off the option to “Auto-update apps over WiFi only”. Be aware that it will probably cost you more to download over a 3G network rather than WiFi. Two files are downloaded when you install Speed Adviser. The main file is about 10 MB and the secondary file about 130MB. If the downloading of the secondary file does not start automatically, accessing Speed Adviser on your phone will guide you through the downloading. CHANGES IN SPEED LIMIT Speed Adviser alerts will go off if you are speeding to remind you to keep within the sign posted limit. Another alert will be played if you continue to speed. Alerts can be spoken in a male or female voice; a simple sound effect or you can disable audio alerts. Speed Adviser display will flash. SCHOOL ZONES Speed Adviser knows where and when every school zone in NSW is active – including gazetted school days and non-standard school zones. Speed Adviser lets you know if a school zone is active and displays the speed limit of 40 km/h. NIGHT DRIVING Speed Adviser automatically switches between day and night modes. The night mode display emits less light, reducing visual strain. HEAVY VEHICLES You can specify if you're driving a heavy vehicle. Speed Adviser will warn you when you exceed the NSW maximum speed limit of 100 km/h. RUN OTHER APPS AT THE SAME TIME Speed Adviser will run in the background, still playing alerts, allowing you to use other apps. L PLATE AND P PLATE DRIVERS Learner and P1 drivers may not use this app. P2 drivers can use Speed Adviser; the app will operate with the maximum100 km/h that applies to all P2 drivers in NSW. WARNINGS You must not adjust the app while driving and must have your phone in a commercial phone mount when using a driver’s aid such as Speed Adviser, in accordance with the NSW Road Rules. Speed Adviser uses your phone’s GPS hardware which uses considerable battery power. You can use a car charger while operating Speed Adviser and should always terminate the app when you are finished with it. PRIVACY Speed Adviser does not collect data or report speeding events to Transport for NSW. ON THE WEB For more info go to http://roadsafety.transport.nsw.gov.au/aboutthecentre/research/roadsafetytechnology/speedadviser/index.html . Go to www.speedadviser.com.au to provide feedback.
release_text: * Updated speed limit data across all NSW * Added advance warning of school zones * Added speed limit data for 1000km of new roads

2.1+ version of "Network Info" Donate version available, buy me a coffee :) Shows info about the phone and the current network, Bluetooth, IPv6 and Cell connection. It also shows your public/external IP & hostname. Only goes on-line to get and resolve the public IP via my own server http://aschillings.co.uk/myscripts/getip.php and to remotely resolve it (see notes below). Initially the application was also using whatismyip.org but, as the server seems to be constantly down it was removed. No ads. >> Information shown << •Device IP and hostname, both private and public. •Current mobile Cell and any neighbours, along with their signal strength, location info and type. •IMSI/ IMEI. •Information about the current mobile provider (MCC+MNC, current connection, etc.) •The Android device unique ID. •Full information regarding the WiFi connection (MAC, current SSID and BSSID, link speed, IP/Netmask, Gateway, DNS and DHCP servers, etc.) •Your current location according to Android based on your network neighbours. No GPS is needed or used. •Information regarding Bluetooth status, the current Bluetooth connection(s) and info about past pairings. •IPv6 device and router IP addresses for all device interfaces (see notes, this should now work for everyone). >> Notes << •This is an expansion of the 'Network Info' application, to support more phones based on the 2.1 Android API. •I only have a GSM/UMTS phone. If anything funny happens on any other phone type, email me and I will try to fix it. •This application will connect to the network only to fetch your external IP/Hostname (using http://aschillings.co.uk/myscripts/getip.php and http://aschillings.co.uk/myscripts/gethostname.php ). No other information is sent (my policy is located below). •Please email me about any bugs or features you want. I cannot see all market comments and I am not notified when someone does comment. •The IPv6 part should now work for everyone. If that is not the case for you, please email me ( aschillings.dev@gmail.com ) so I can try to fix it. If possible, download 'Under the hood' from the market and send me the results via export. •If you want to show the Vendor which owns a MAC address, download 'MAC (OUI) Database' from the market (it is one of my applications) and use it to download a copy of the OUI database. •In version v0.5.2 I added remote hostname resolution which is your public hostname as is resolved by my server. It should be the same as your external hostname, unless there is a record propagation delay or your DNS server is lying (like some home routers which resolve their external address as a local hostname). My server is hosted by 1and1 so this will be unreliable if you use the same DNS servers. •'Ext. Hostname (L)' is the hostname your device resolves your external IP (local resolve).\n •'Ext. Hostname (R)' is the hostname my server resolves your external IP (remote resolve). •'Field Test' is a hidden application which comes installed in HTC phones. The menu item will only appear if the 'Field Test' is installed in your phone. >> Known Issues << Samsung devices do not display Neighbouring Cells. This is a problem in Samsung's Android implementation and there is nothing I can do. >> Privacy Statement << I do not collect any information which can directly and uniquely identify and/or bind a user to a device or any other personal information. When you retrieve your external IP address, my server will log a standard website “hit” which is the same as if you browsed a page on my server using a browser. No other information is logged or kept. *** Please email me with any bugs/problems/feature requests. I cannot reply to market comments which can make debugging difficult. ***

description: Welcome to explore the United States Of America (USA). This application gives you information about the United States Of America (USA). Explore history off USA. Learn everything about the United States Of America (USA). Quick Information: The United States of America (USA), commonly referred to as the United States (US), America, or simply the States, is a federal republic consisting of 50 states, 16 territories, and a federal district. The 48 contiguous states and the federal district of Washington, D.C., are in central North America between Canada and Mexico. The state of Alaska is the northwestern part of North America and the state of Hawaii is an archipelago in the mid-Pacific. The country also has five populated and nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean. The largest of these territories are Puerto Rico and the American Virgin Islands. At 3.79 million square miles (9.83 million km2) in total and with around 316 million people, the United States is the fourth-largest country by total area and third largest by population. It is one of the world's most ethnically diverse and multicultural nations, the product of large-scale immigration from many countries. The geography and climate of the United States is also extremely diverse, and it is home to a wide variety of wildlife. General informations about the United States Of America: - Etymology - History - Geography - Climate and environment - Environmental issues - Political divisions - Parties and elections - Foreign relations - Government finance - Public debt - Military - Crime and law enforcement - Economy - Income, poverty, and wealth - Transportation - Popular media - Literature philosophy, and the arts - Food - Sports

description: Create your child's photo book on the go. Publish to secure web page. Post To Facebook. Email the events to your family and friends. Never lose those memories. Must have app for Moms and Dads. With baby journal app you don't have to wait to come home. Start capturing those precious moments right from the hospital room. This is an easy, efficient and fun way to create the baby journal and mark important events on the baby calendar. New events can be added easily on Calendar and can be viewed from journal. Events can also be edited or deleted. For a quick glance on photos, just go to the photos tab. Baby Journal app is like a scrapbook. You can pick different stickers while adding new events. Individual events can be shared with your family and freinds when you are in journal. Complete journal can be shared through the share tab. Now you can also post the baby diary/journal to your Facebook. This is the first version. We always encourage feedback from users to make this app better than before. Version 1.6: Bug Fixes Keywords: Baby Book, Baby First year, Scrapbook, Online Baby Journal, Baby Diary, Baby Events Log
release_text: Now you can publish the mobile baby journal, photo book to secure online web journal. Web based journal can be shared with your friends and family. Web journal can be accessed at http://www.babyfirstjournal.com

* * * * * If you like my free app you can support me by buying the pay version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=barsnick.felix.camcalc.don This includes the same functionality, so it is only a small financial thank you to me. The pay app will always be Ad free! * * * * * DSLR CamCalc is a helper to calculate values ​​and settings related to photography. By day and night my app helps you create wonderful pictures during day and at night with clear and very useful features. But this is no app to make or edit photos on your smartphone. This can be calculated: + Maximum exposure time without star trails at night + Calculate the hyperfocal distance + Calculate the Depth of Field <<-- NEW + Calculate the critical aperture to avoid diffraction blur << -- NEW + How to adjust the exposure time to a modified ISO and aperture + Extension of the exposure time for up to three neutral density filters + Calculate sun / moon rise and set for any date and location << -- NEW + Determine the stereo basis for 3D Photos The following sensorsizes are now supported: + Fullframe + APS-C Canon + APS-H Canon + DX Nikon + CX Nikon + Sony/Pentax APS-C + (Micro-)Four-Thirds This app is in constant change, I appreciate any user feedback and always keep that in mind for my app updates. In the latest version, the permission to access GPS is added. The GPS position is only used for sun and moon rise and set calculation and not otherwise. This app uses anonymous user tracking by Flurry. Visit their website for more information www.flurry.com

app_name: 電池残量表示ウィジェット.初音ミク[VOCALOID]
description: ニコニコ動画などでも大人気のボーカロイド、初音ミク（はつねみく）があなたのスマホを完璧にサポート！ 【ミクラボ】による初音ミクシリーズ第一弾、電池残量表示ウィジェットver.初音ミクが登場です！ お使いのスマートフォンの電池残量がひとめで細かくわかります！ さらに節電設定機能でバッテリーの減りも抑える事が出来ます！ ボカロ好きの友達に自慢しよう♪ ＊＊＊＊便利な機能＊＊＊＊ ◆シンプルなデザインにこだわり、誰にでも使いやすいアプリに仕上げました。 ◆1刻みのパーセント表示なので、バッテリー残量が細かくわかります。 ◆サイズは3種類あります。お好みのサイズでご利用下さい。 ◆節電設定で充電超長持ち！！ ☆ワンタッチの簡単節電設定☆ 以下項目のＯＮ/ＯＦＦが切り替えられます。 ・WiFi設定 ・Bluetooth設定 ・画面の自動回転設定 ・アカウント自動同期設定 ・GPS設定 使わない機能をオフにして充電を長持ちさせよう♪ ※ウィジェット一覧に当アプリが表示されない方へ※ ・解決方法その1 Android OSが、ウィジェット一覧を更新しそこねることがあるため 一覧を表示したまま、お使いの端末本体を横もしくは縦に倒して 画面表示を横向きもしくは縦向きにして、一覧を更新して下さい。 一覧が更新されれば当アプリのアイコンが登場します。 もし更新しても表示されない方は お手数ですが端末の再起動や、アプリの再インストールをお試し下さい。 ・解決方法その2 インストール先がSDカードになっていないかチェックして下さい。 ウィジェットはSDカードでなく端末本体にインストールしないと正常に動作しません。 自動的にインストール先は本体端末となりますが 一部機種ではSDカードへインストール出来てしまったり、もしくは手動でSDカードへ移動させた場合などに、 正常に動作しないという問題が発生してしまいます。 お手数ですがインストールの際には保存先を確認して 端末本体に保存するようお願い致します。 ※パーセント等が正常に表示されない方へ※ 端末自体のメモリが少ない機種をお使いの場合は うまく表示出来ずに、電池のパーセントがズレる場合があります。 予めご了承下さいませ。 インストール時の権限に現在地情報が必要となっておりますが これはGPS機能の節電設定をするためのものです。 ご安心くださいませ。 ミクラボは皆様の声援とアドバイスで成り立っています。 こんな便利アプリが欲しい！といったご要望がありましたら ぜひレビューにリクエストの書き込みをお願い致します！ これからもミクラボをご愛顧下さいますようよろしくお願い致します！ 本アプリはピアプロ・キャラクター・ライセンスに基づいてクリプトン・フューチャー・メディア株式会社のキャラクター「初音ミク」を使用しております。

description: Dé oplossing als u online wilt bankieren op uw tablet. Met de snelle en gebruiksvriendelijke Belfius Direct Tablet app kunt u de stand van uw rekeningen en van uw kredietkaart raadplegen of een overschrijving doen waar en wanneer u maar wilt, in alle veiligheid! Deze toepassing werd speciaal ontwikkeld voor tablets, met een uniek design! Gebruiksvriendelijk én een streling voor het oog! Bent u nog geen Belfius-klant? Word meteen klant via onze app en ontvang het gratis pack Belfius Pulse Start! Let op: is het de eerste keer dat u inlogt? Registreer uw toestel dan eerst met uw bankkaart en uw kaartlezer. Zo is de veiligheid van uw verrichtingen perfect gegarandeerd. Nadien volstaat uw wachtwoord om u aan te melden! Profiteer van alle bestaande functies: - een overschrijving doen; - verrichtingen zonder kaartlezer tekenen (afhankelijk van uw limieten); - verrichtingen die meerdere handtekeningen vereisen, zonder kaartlezer tekenen; - verrichtingen tussen uw rekeningen uitvoeren; - Zoomit-documenten bekijken, wijzigen en tekenen, via het menu Overschrijving; - doorlopende opdrachten raadplegen en beheren; - de lijst van uw begunstigden beheren; - het saldo en de historiek van uw privé- of professionele rekeningen op een innovatieve manier raadplegen; - een verrichting opzoeken in uw historiek of in de evolutiegrafiek van uw saldo; - limieten beheren voor overschrijvingen vanaf zichtrekeningen via de app; - verbruikte bedrag van een limiet raadplegen; - het saldo, de historiek en de afsluitingen van uw kredietkaart raadplegen; - de limiet van uw kredietkaart wijzigen; - uw MasterCard Prepaid opladen; - een overzicht krijgen van uw beleggingen, inclusief de waarde-evolutie, de detailweergave en de min- en meerwaarden; - inkomsten en uitgaven beheren via Belfius Budget Assistant; - de app een sterke persoonlijke toets geven in ‘Mijn overzicht’; - uw profiel met een foto personaliseren; - contact opnemen met Belfius; - uw Mobile-contract beheren; - consulteren van uw pensioenspaarrekening; - storting op uw pensioenspaarrekening. - een spaarrekening openen. Om al deze functies te kunnen gebruiken, maakt u eerst een Belfius Direct Mobile-contract aan, direct in de app zelf of via de optie ‘Mijn mobiele diensten’ in Belfius Direct Net (de online bankservice van Belfius Bank). De rest is kinderspel! The solution if you want to online banking on your tablet. With the fast and user Belfius Direct Tablet app allows you to check the status of your accounts and your credit card or bank transfer whenever and wherever you want, in complete safety!   This application was developed specifically for tablets, with a unique design! description: Meteogram Widget - Free and Donate version Meteogram widget is a unique app because it shows the weather in a very detailed way at a glance on your home screen. The app comes in a free and a donate version ( Google Play: http://goo.gl/HbxHGx ). Support us by buying the donate version, offering some extra features (e.g. 10 day long term forecast, sunrise and sunset indication, show moon phase...). Besides those extra features, the app is more regularly updated. The app: the weather at a glance on your home screen Meteogram widget is a unique app because it shows the weather in a very detailed way at a glance on your home screen. While a lot of weather apps are showing the weather forecast in a rather basic way, this app does that by visualizing the forecast in a so-called meteogram. Doing so gives the user a much better idea of when exactly rain will fall, the sun will be shining, when it will become cloudy... The main focus of the app consists in showing the meteogram on a small home screen widget (e.g. a 4X1 widget). Even while the widget does not occupy that much space on the home screen, it still manages showing the forecast in a very clear way. Simply add a widget on your home screen, specify your location (or let the widget automatically determine your location) and the weather forecast appears on your home screen. The meteogram shows the temperature and expected precipitation for the whole forecast period. Besides those typical weather elements, the wind speed, wind direction and air pressure can also be visualized. The user has all freedom to determine how the meteogram should look like: a great set of configuration settings allows the user to customize the widget completely to his own needs. Feature overview • Temperature, precipitation, wind and pressure • Cloudiness indication • Short term forecast (next 24 or 48 hours) • Short term forecast for the next 5 days • Lots of user settings: colors, weather elements, ... Not all features are available in the free version. Below is a summary of the features that are exclusively available in the donate version (Google Play Store: http://goo.gl/HbxHGx) : • Long term forecast (next 10 days) • Show sunrise and sunset • Show wind vane for wind direction • Blue temperature line color when below freezing • Custom line thickness and style • Save settings as default settings • Show moon phase • Show wind chill • For United States only: NOAA as weather provider • More updates Weather forecast data All thanks to MET.NO (The Norwegian Meteorological Institute) for offering the weather forecast data. For a lot of European countries hourly forecast data is available, while for other countries 3 hourly data is available. For the long term forecast period, one of the best weather models - ECMWF - is used. Some remarks • Contact me if you have suggestions, remarks, issues... ( info@meteogramwidget.com ). • The app is optimized for use on smartphones • Join our Google+ Community : https://plus.google.com/communities/107244343755721103588

description: The KBC Research app gives you access to the expertise of the KBC Market Research Desk. Daily in-depth analyses and forecasts on fixed income and foreign exchange markets, focused on the Euro zone, US, UK and Central Europe. You don’t have to register or log in. All you need to do is download the app. What to expect from KBC Research • Daily reports on developments in fixed income and foreign exchange markets and analysis of economic data. • A weekly overview of important economic data, government bond auctions and other events for financial markets. • Daily updated and historical graphs of exchange rates and interest rates. • Overview of KBC macroeconomic forecasts and forecasts for exchange rates and interest rates. • Short analysis and comments on what’s happening on the financial markets. The downloaded information remains available offline and you can archive the reports. Note for users: This application contains non-exhaustive information and is based on short-term forecasts for expected developments on the financial markets. KBC Bank cannot guarantee that these forecasts will materialise and cannot be held liable in any way for direct or consequential loss arising from any use of this document or its content. The document is not intended as personalised investment advice and does not constitute a recommendation to buy, sell or hold investments described in it. Although it has been obtained from and is based on sources KBC believes to be reliable, KBC does not guarantee the accuracy of this information, which may be incomplete or condensed. All opinions and estimates constitute a KBC judgement on the date of the report and are subject to change without notice.

description: If your car breaks down or you’re involved in an car accident in Belgium or abroad, you obviously want to receive assistance as quickly as possible. To ensure this happens, KBC Insurance has developed a free App called KBC Assistance. Just one push of the button and you can contact a roadside assistance provider day or night wherever mobile phone coverage is available. At the same time, the provider also has all the information necessary (who you are, where you’re at, etc.) to assist you as quickly and efficiently as possible. The way in which you are assisted depends on the cover afforded by your assistance insurance policy. For optimal performance in Belgium, you should permit geolocation and enable your Internet connection. For optimal performance abroad, you should activate data roaming as well. Remember this may involve additional charges! KBC has developed this App especially for customer who have taken out fully comprehensive insurance or assistance cover. To get going, the only thing you have to do is download the App and install it… More info at www.kbc.be/kbcassistance

*** Root required *** This application will allow to use your device as a remote mouse and keyboard for your PC/PS3. Since low level apis are used, there is no way by now to ensure 100% compatibility with all devices (because of different bluetooth implementations of some vendors): if the log says "invalid or inactive bluetooth device" your only option is to try a different ROM like Cyanogenmod (if available). Look at the video tutorials for more info: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mU2Gwv3YmzA http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQiCy46KCTE http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gfF6Qp1CUQU Quick tutorial: - Open the application and click on the start button (top/left button ">") - Check for errors in the log window - IMPORTANT: if you got the error "invalid or inactive bluetooth device", your device is not supported and your only option is to try a different ROM like Cyanogenmod (I cannot fix that because the problem is at "kernel" level). - Pair your device with an host of your choice* - Once paired, click on the lens button (secondo top/left) to refresh the available bluetooth devices - Click on a device of your choice to establish a connection - Once connected a green screen should appear - Single press to simulate the left mouse button (the background should change in blue) - Double press to simulate the right mouse button (the background should change in red) - Hit "menu" to show/hide/change the keyboard *Tested hosts: - PS3: works - Linux: works (tested on Ubuntu 10.10) - Windows 7: not working yet - MAC: ? (not tested) - Vizio Internet TV: works Like this app? Please rate 5 stars so that it can be improved, thanks! This is an ad-supported application (it won't start if you disabled ad on your device): please consider buying "BlueputDroidPro" (which doesn't require enabled ad) if you need an ad-free/donation version. Please respect my work and don't waste your time with unnecessary comments or bad rating for adchecker.

description: FTPDroid is an FTP server for Android that will let you to manage files and folders on your device without the USB cable. The benefits of using this application are: - Transfer files and folders to/from any computer and your device without the need of the USB cable. - No need anymore to mount/unmount the SD card. - Easily share files with other devices (Android or anything else, see the FAQs) - Keep the USB port of your device safe. Why FTPDroid is the best FTP server for Android? Because it's not YAFS (Yet Another FTP Server) since is a native port to Android of best FTP server around: Pure-FTPd http://www.pureftpd.org Features: - Anonymous access - Configurable users - Restrict access to specific folders - Active and passive mode - Multiple files transfers - UTF-8 support - Root support to allow binding on standard FTP port 21 (please note that root is supported but NOT required) - SSL/TLS support (pro) - App widget (pro) FAQs: q: How can I share files with another device? a: Look for an FTP client (every system like Android, iOS and Windows Phone has its own). q: Why my transfer speed decrease when I turn off the screen? a: Enable the option 'Lock Wifi'. If your device is running at least Android 2.3.x, you should get full speed transfer even when the screen is off, otherwise enable the option 'Lock screen' too. q: How can I disable anonymous access? a: Please follow the instructions in the help (open the menu from the main page of the application).
release_text: 2.1.1 - Preliminary Android 5 support (may not work with root yet) 2.1.0 - Optimized layout for tablets - Fixed a problem with in-app purchase restore - Google Play Services updated - Minor UI changes

description: *** ROOT REQUIRED *** SambaDroid is a native port for Android of the popular Samba for Linux. This application allows you to share/manage files on your device easily from any PC of your network: once started just type [Win]+[R] in your computer, write \\SAMBADROID and enjoy! FAQs: q: Why my transfer speed decrease when I turn off the screen? a: Enable the option 'Lock Wifi'. If your device is running at least Android 2.3.x, you should get full speed transfer even when the screen is off, otherwise enable the option 'Lock screen' too. q: I got the message "Can not find a valid WiFi interface", how can I solve it? a: On some devices (Galaxy Note 2 in particular) the WiFi interface is not detected from the application, please set the option "Bind interfaces" to wlan0 q: How can I use this app if my device is connected with an ethernet cable? a: Disable the require WiFi option and set as bind interface eth0

description: This is the Bible in simple language (spanish). Here you can not only read the sacred scriptures easily due to its good font size and simple vocabulary, but also hear it, as through a convenient button to turn on and off the voice of reading, this Bible will be read in viva voice. If you are performing tasks that do not allow you to be reading the Bible, with this version may also meet the Word of God, who will accompany you in listening with a pleasant voice. The Bible in simple language is a shortened and simplified version of the text universally recognized as the Word of God, for that is understandable through a reduced vocabulary and hold their value essential as teaching material and Christian religious guide. Now may accompany you on your phone or Android tablet to allow her to study and reference where you may need to hear or read the Holy Scripture. For the reading, the sacred text is auto adjust its size in order to provide an easy to view independent of the size of the screen on your Android device. WARNING: To make it possible to hear the narration of this Bible, you must have previously activated and configured in the appropriate language, the system of voice synthesis of Android. On most phones and current tablets this already comes pre-installed, but in the case that it isn't, you can activate it from the SETTINGS menu of Android, in the part of Language and Text Input.

This play ready app can be thoroughly enjoyed whether you are on a plane, at your comfort zone, waiting for a friend, at the taxi, bus or train station, at the back seat of a car or even at work or even while getting ready for an exam. Take part in the fun, challenge your friends and climb the leaderboards while earning trophies and test your skills. This is one of the best ways to gain knowledge and sharpen your basics about Music, while learning a lot through entertainment. Features:- - Time based quiz - No hassle, no fancy distractions – made easy to read and answer questions swiftly - Challenge your Friends and all around the globe. - Leaderboards and trophies. - Five Categories, Each category includes 20 levels. -Affluent design just to please your experience and pleasure
This application is simple reversi and does not display an advertisement. Features 1. One or Two player mode. 2. Undo function. 3. 10 difficulty levels. *Reversi does not require permission.
release_text: 2011/10/04 AI engine was updated. The level of difficulty is added to ten steps.

description: The number one must have quiz game for your mobile or tablet. With over 1,000 questions, over 1,000 question related facts and 4 exciting game modes this game will challange you on various topics and difficulty. Simply trivial will quiz you on a range of questions from various topics, such as: General Knowledge, Science, Maths, History, Food, Literature, Computing, Arts, Fashion etc. On completion of each game, your highscore will be saved and you can try and beat that highscore next time round. Language: English Android 1.6+ Tested Screens: (Works on multiple screen sizes) 400x240 800x480 1024x600 1280x800 (Not Optimal but fully functional) Known issues: **Random SQL and Audio error.** Fix: Restart the app. Keywords: quiz, general knowledge, pub quiz, trivial, trivia, quizzes

Celeb Heads Up Charades! by Blueique Studios. (NOT affiliated with Ellen iPhone Heads Up! app) An INSANELY funny game that will have you laughing in tears! The concept is simple, guess the word on the card that will sit on your head, from the clues your friends give you BEFORE the timer runs out! Your friends can use funny voices, mimic celebrities and moo like a cow - all to make you guess. Sorry no video recording! Awesome Instructions: - Hold phone to your head - Tilt the phone forward to bring up a new card, for a correct answer. - Have your friend describe the word on the card, but remember don't say the word on the card! - Tilt the phone back to pass. - All it takes is one friend to start playing, or play with many SIX Categories include: - Stranger Than Fiction: Jump for joy as your friends guess your most loved cartoon, TV and movie characters! - Make an Impression: Have your friends in hysterical laughter as you mimic a French accent or Texan! - Movies: Laugh as your friends mime Iron Man and other popular Hollywood movies! - Ani-mania: Double over in giggles as your friends moo like a cow and other animals! - Celebs: Watch your friends try their best to describe Jennifer Aniston and other stars! - Reality TV: Cry with tears as your friends pretend to be the cast from quality reality TV series such as 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians'. Parties will never be the same again, and you will be the life of the party! Disclaimer I: We are in NO WAY affiliated with the iPhone Heads Up! game that Ellen DeGeneres plays on her show or Hey Hey it's Saturday Celebrity Head game.
release_text: Added 27 Categories! - Added Pass/Correct cards. Made tilting more responsive. - Completely Reworked. Can tap to play instead of tilting. Larger clearer text. Clean Less Cluttered Interface.

description: L’App Quotazioni di Borsa di BNP Paribas BNL mostra le quotazioni in tempo reale di azioni, indici, valute, materie prime e tassi d’interesse. Consulta da smartphone e tablet le news finanziarie e l’ampia gamma di certificati d’investimento e leva fissa e variabile (Turbo) proposti da BNP Paribas per soddisfare ogni esigenza di mercato. Il sito Prodotti di Borsa sul tuo smartphone e tablet! Real Time, Quotazioni in tempo reale: Vuoi monitorare il mercato finanziario in ogni momento e tenerti aggiornato sui sottostanti su cui hai investito? La sezione Real Time ti fornisce le quotazioni delle principali azioni, indici, valute, materie prime: tutto in tempo reale. In evidenza: Le più importanti news dai mercati finanziari, le soluzioni d’investimento adatte a diverse esigenze di mercato e le analisi tecniche sui principali indici europei. Inoltre tutte le newsletter di BNP Paribas. BNL: I certificati in collocamento presso le filiali BNL e l’esclusiva online: consulta le informazioni , scopri le interessanti opportunità di ogni mese e sfoglia il mensile “Un mese di Borsa”. Cerca: Trova i certificates che più si adattano alle tue preferenze e aspettative: vuoi investire a leva? al rialzo? Al ribasso? Oppure preferisci un investimento di lungo periodo? La gamma di certificati targati BNP Paribas risponde a tutte le esigenze degli investitori. Servizi: Scopri come funzionano i certificati nella sezione Academy, come contattare il team di Prodotti di Borsa o come scoprire importanti novità come i seminari. Keywords: _ Prodotti di Borsa _ Quotazioni _ Quotazioni di Borsa _ Quotazioni Real Time _ Quotazioni in tempo reale _ Borsa Italiana _ Borsa in tempo reale _ Borsa real time _ News finanza _ Notizie finanza _ News finanziarie _ Notizie finanziarie _ Mercato finanziario _ Mercati finanziari _ Azioni _ Indici _ Certificati _ Certificate _ Andamento azioni _ Andamento indici _ Andamento borsa _ Trading _ Trading online _ Investire in borsa _ Investire _ FTSE MIB _ Leva _ Turbo The App Market Prices BNL BNP Paribas shows real-time quotes of stocks, indices, currencies, commodities and interest rates. View from smartphones and tablets the financial news and the wide range of investment certificates and leverage fixed and variable (Turbo) offered by BNP Paribas to meet every need of the market. The website of Borsa products on your smartphone and tablet! Real Time, Real-time quotes: Do you want to monitor the financial market at all times and keep abreast of the underlying on which you have invested? The section Real Time gives you the prices of major stocks, indices, currencies, commodities, all in real time. Highlights: The most important news from the financial markets, the investment solutions for different requirements of market and technical analysis of the major European indices. In addition, all newsletters BNP Paribas. BNL: The certificates placement at the BNL branches and the exclusive online: See the information, discover the exciting opportunities of each month and browse the monthly "A month of the Stock Exchange." Search for: Find the certificates that suit your preferences and expectations: do you want to invest in leverage? the upside? The downside? Or do you prefer a long term investment? The range of certificates targati BNP Paribas meets all the needs of investors. Services: Find out how certificates work in the Academy, how to contact the team Products Stock Exchange or how to find out important news such as seminars. Keywords: _ Products of Stock Exchange _ Quotes _ Market Prices _ Real-Time Quotes _ Real-time quotes _ Italian Stock Exchange _ Stock Exchange in real time _ Stock Market real-time _ Finance News _ Finance News _ Financial News _ Financial News _ The Financial Market _ Financial Markets _ Shares _ Indices _ Certificates _ Certificate _ Performance shares _ Performance indices _ Performance bag _ Trading _ Online Trading _ Investing in the stock market _ Investing _ Dow _ Lever _ Turbo

description: This app provides complete information about borderline personality disorder diseases. Best comprehensive overview covers the symptoms and treatment of borderline personality disorder . This app has been developed for everyone, all topics has been made to make it complete, useful and interesting. We hope you will find this app very informative and useful. If you like it please do share it with your friends and family. Application does not overload you with complicated medical terminology, the language is clear and does not require any proficiency. ❤❤❤❤❤ Content & Features ❤❤❤❤❤ • how to prevent yourself from borderline personality disorder • definition , description of disease and symptoms sign • what are the causes of borderline personality disorder and risk factors • preparing for your appointment • tests and diagnosis • treatments and prevention • lifestyle and home remedies • internal medical disorders • congenital and inherited disorders • infectious diseases and organisms • drugs and medication for borderline personality disorder • easy to read and download & beautiful full screen slideshows • table of Contents can be used for easy access. • search option is available for quick search of the topic. • friendly and easy to use. • simple uses and indications. • easy to study, no need to install or keep updating local databases • important from examination point of view. • add to favorite option is added. • always new content will come in regular updates • internet connection is not required in order to use this app • 100% Free!!! anyway, this is a great worth app for your heath What to handle your heath from now on? Download this App now and learn from it for you loved. Help to keep away from borderline personality disorder in your family! Just download it and learn from it! Enjoy! ^_^ ❤❤❤❤❤ ATTENTION ❤❤❤❤❤ This app contains borderline personality disorder diseases information for knowledge if you need to apply then please contact to nearby doctor. Useful information but is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. If you think you may have a medical emergency, immediately call your doctor or the emergency services. Before acting on any of the information in this application, consult with your doctor to make sure that it is right for you. Information of the diseases, contained in this application, are not intended for medical treatment without a doctor and can be used for information purposes only. This app cannot and should not replace a pharmacist or a doctor consultation. App content is only for pocket reference & educational purposes. Consult a doctor before actual usage of any of the information in this app. ❤❤❤❤❤ App Developer Note ❤❤❤❤❤ Please Rate it 5 Star for our application and feel free to email us about any comments or suggestions for future improvement. In case you face any problems do send us an email with information about your phone model, and the exact problem, and we'll try to fix it immediately.

Play to learn math in the most entertaining way, combining operations and activities with our funny pictures. Suitable for children from USA , Canada , UK , Australia , New Zealand , India, Singapore , Hong Kong, ... Math practice for kids. It has 50 different games to learn math in second grade, divided into : ★ Add. ★ Subtract. ★ Fractions (with building blocks and pizzas). ★ Count. ★ Coin Math ( EUR / USD / GBP). ★ Geometry (polygons and polyhedra ). ★ Time ( analog clock, days of the week, months of the year). Learn math with BORIOL! Kids will love this game because it shows numbers, operations , polygons , watches, ... with a nice interface . You 'll like it too because this app it is based on the curriculum of second grade . Easy to play . You have the option of unlimited play . You can see your progress step by step . Além disso, elas são classificadas por tempo de preparo e número de porções exata que rende: tudo pra você se organizar direitinho! All recipes are tested and accompanied by pictures: guarantee it will work and be a delight! You can still display the dishes for a friend or relative by email and even share them on social networks straight from your mobile phone! Show everybody that you rock in the kitchen! The application has been recommended by the magazine Info and 250 thousand people have already tested and approved! You will be left out? - Reworked layout - All the recipes accompanied the photo, preparation time and yield portions - Search by recipe or ingredient - Selection of favorites for each user - Sharing via email and social networks Downloaded now and receive praise in the kitchen!

description: APLICATIVO NÃO OFICIAL. ATENÇÃO: Esta aplicação funciona APENAS para o Detran de PERNAMBUCO. ATENÇÃO: As informações sobre os veículos bem como a DISPONIBILIDADE são de responsabilidade do Detran de Pernambuco. Esta aplicação apenas faz a consulta e exibe os dados para o usuário, assim poupando tempo e banda de internet do usuário. ATENÇÃO: Se por acaso a consulta não funcionar, por favor antes de avaliar a app negativamente tente entrar em contato pelo e-mail placasdetranpe@gmail.com . Muito obrigado. Consulte facilmente: 1 - Placas de veículos registrados no Detran do estado de PERNAMBUCO; 2 - Pontuação na carteira CNH (Carteira Nacional de Habilitação). Não perca mais tempo acessando o site. Com a aplicação Placas Detran PE você economiza tempo e plano de dados nas consultas citadas acima. IDEAL PARA: 1 - Quem trabalha no trânsito, por exemplo: 1.1 - BPTran; 1.2 - CTTU; 1.3 - Trânsito Educadores; 1.4 - Agentes de trânsito em geral. 2 - Quem trabalha em segurança pública: 2.1 - Diversos batalhões da Polícia Militar; 2.2 - Polícia Civil; 2.3 - Guarda Municipal. 3 - Quem trabalha com compra e venda de veículos usados: 3.1 - Agências; 3.2 - Corretores; 3.3 - Concessionárias; 3.4 - Locadoras. 4 - Pessoas físicas e jurídicas em geral: 4.1 - Consulta de situação de carros particulares; 4.2 - Consulta de situação de carros pertencentes a frotas; 4.3 - Taxistas. Com o Placas Detran PE você só precisa digitar a placa para ter acesso aos dados do veículo e detalhamento dos débitos como multas, restrições e licenciamento. Para consultar a pontuação e multas para o motorista também é simples: basta informar o CPF, CNH nova ou CNH antiga. Fácil e rápido. ATENÇÃO: Esta aplicação funciona APENAS para o Detran de PERNAMBUCO. Isto está bem claro no nome do aplicativo, na descrição e até na imagem da página. Por favor, não avalie o aplicativo negativamente caso este não funcione no seu estado. APLICATIVO NÃO OFICIAL. Observação: As informações sobre os veículos são de responsabilidade do Detran de Pernambuco. Esta aplicação apenas faz a consulta e exibe os dados para o usuário. Keywords: detran, pe, carro, moto, ônibus, caminhão, consulta, débito, multa, licenciamento, pontuação, carteira de motorista, cnh, habilitação, APLICATIVO NÃO OFICIAL. Saiba como fazer doações aqui: https://placasdetranpe.wordpress.com/
release_text: 5.1 - Opção de habilitar ou desabilitar o histórico de placas consultadas. 5.0 - Aviso de baixa do gravame (atendendo a pedidos); - Melhoria na visualização dos dados dos veículos; - Correção de bugs e outras melhorias; - Possiblidade de recomendar o aplicativo. Entre em contato: placasdetranpe@gmail.com

description: O rastreador de aproximação é um aplicativo de segurança que envia SMS para outro celular ou tablet que possua o aplicativo instalado com o objetivo de avisar que você esta se aproximando de um local previamente selecionado no GPS do SEU CELULAR. EX: Você esta em sua casa, seleciona em seu celular o LOCAL ou seja faz com que seu celular reconheça as coordenadas geográficas para onde deverá enviar o SMS quando você estiver se aproximando, neste caso sua casa. Em seguida você seleciona o numero ou os números de celular e ou tablet que você deseja que receba o SMS avisando que você esta se aproximando de seu ponto selecionado. Para seu funcionamento e simples: Você devera agora definir no seu aparelho a distancia de aproximação que você deseja que o seu celular comece a enviar os SMS para o celular/tablet previamente selecionado, observe que estes aparelhos que vão receber o SMS não precisarão estar obrigatoriamente no ponto determinado poderão estar em qualquer local. Toda Vez que você estiver se dirigindo para o Ponto Marcado em seu celular e desejar que o aparelho que você selecionou para receber o aviso de aproximação seja acionado você deve ativar o aplicativo e a partir daí uma vez que você entre no raio do GPS de distância selecionado independente da direção de aproximação o seu celular enviara automaticamente a mensagem de aviso. PASSO A PASSO: 1. O usuário seleciona marcar ponto, será exibida no mapa a localização atual, ao clicar em marcar local, será marcada a posição atual que você se encontra. (OBS. A distância do ponto é o raio de segurança, o qual será enviado sua posição aos números cadastrados quando você entrar no raio, o mínimo é 200 metros). 2. Selecionar os contatos que você quer avisar quando estiver chegando no local determinado. 3. Definir o intervalo de tempo de envio da sua localização. (OBS. Caso não seja informado o intervalo o aplicativo enviará sua localização apenas uma vez quando você entrar no raio definido). 4. Em ver últimas localizações, você pode ver ou excluir as últimas localizações quando desejar. 5. Em ver últimas localizações, você pode ver ou excluir as últimas localizações quando desejar. The crawler approach is a security application that sends SMS to another mobile phone or tablet that has the application installed in order to warn you that you are approaching a previously selected location in GPS YOUR PHONE. EX: You're in your home, on your cell selects the LOCAL ie makes your phone recognizes the geographic coordinates for where you should send the SMS when you are approaching, in this case your home. Then you select the number or mobile numbers or tablet and you want to receive SMS warning that you are approaching your selected point. For its operation and simple: You should now set on your device the distance of approach you want your phone to start sending the SMS to the mobile / tablet previously selected, note that these devices that will receive the SMS does not necessarily need to be at a particular point may be any location. Every Time you're heading to the Marked Point on your phone and you want the device you have selected to receive notice of approach is set, you must activate the application and from there once you enter the radius of the GPS away selected independent of the direction of approach your phone automatically sent the warning message. STEP BY STEP: 1. The user selects scoring point appears on the map the current location, click the mark location, the current position is marked you meet. (NOTE The distance from the radius point is security, which will be sent to your position numbers registered when you enter the radius, the minimum is 200 meters). 2. Select the contacts you want to alert when arriving at the given location. 3. Set the time interval for sending your location. (NOTE If the interval is not provided the application will send your location only once when you enter the radius defined). 4. In view latest locations, you can view or delete the latest locations when desired. 5. In view latest locations, you can view or delete the latest locations when desired.

description: O cuidador de remédio é um aplicativo para Android que tem por finalidade principal auxiliar os profissionais cuidadores e enfermeiros(as) a controlarem mesmo a distância, se seus pacientes estão atentos aos horários de seus medicamentos. Nota: As musicas devem estar na pasta Sounds do cartão SD no formato MP3 ou MID The caregiver remedy is an Android app that aims to help primary caregivers and nurses (as) to control the distance even if their patients are aware of the schedule of your medications. It can also be used for personal use to control the time to take your medicine when the function is not activated caregiver. Note: The songs should be in the Sounds folder of the SD card in MP3 or MID

Localize seus amigos, seus familiares sem a necessidade de adquirir outros equipamentos especiais de rastreamento, utilizando apenas 2 aparelhos celulares com sistema Android que possui GPS. Este aplicativo tem como objetivo fornecer as coordenadas de GPS em locais que não possui internet. Um sistema de localização inteligente de integração social que você utiliza somente quando quiser localizar seus amigos. Assim quando você precisar localizar um amigo, o sistema enviara um SMS para o outro celular selecionado, e este então retornara a sua posição no mapa com data e hora e também as coordenadas de latitude e longitude. ATENÇÃO: Caso o numero que você deseja localizar ou o numero que você deseja dar permissão para que te localize NÃO for LOCAL coloque o 0XX(Operadora) e o código de área, na hora de localizar e ao dar permissão para que o aplicativo funcione corretamente. Privacidade: O usuário cadastra os números que ele permitirá acesso a sua localização, o sistema irá aceitar o pedido e fornecerá a sua posição apenas para os números cadastrados, outras pessoas mesmo que possuam o sistema não invadirão sua privacidade. Passo 1: insira o número que deseja localizar e clique em localizar. Passo 2: Para permitir que localizem sua posição clique em Autorizar contatos que podem me localizar. Passo 3: Insira os números que você desejar. Opção. Você pode fazer uma solicitação e verificar a posição quando desejar, sem ter a necessidade de ficar aguardando. Para isso clique em configurações e marque a opção Salvar última solicitação. Para visualizar a última solicitação, na tela principal aparecerá um botão ver última solicitação basta clicar que será exibida no mapa a última solicitação com a posição do celular. Locate your friends, your family members without the need to purchase other special equipment tracking, using only 2 mobile devices with Android system which has GPS.   This application aims to provide GPS coordinates for locations that do not have internet. A location system intelligent social integration that you use only when you want to find your friends. So when you need to find a friend, the system sent an SMS to another cell selected, and then returned to this position on the map with date and time and also the latitude and longitude. ATTENTION: If the number you want to locate or number you want to give permission for you locate the place is NOT PLACE 0XX (Operator) and the area code, in locating and giving permission for the application to function properly. Privacy: The user registers the numbers that it will allow access to its location, the system will accept the request and provide their position only numbers registered, other people even if they have the system does not invade your privacy. Step 1: Enter the number you want to find and click Find. Step 2: To allow locate your position click Authorize contacts that can locate me. Step 3: Enter the numbers you want. Option. You can make a request and check the position when you want, without having the need to stand waiting. For this click Settings and select the save last request. To view the last request, on the main screen appears a button to see last request just click that appears on the map the last request with the position of the cell.

description: Versão off-line e sem anúncios da Bíblia e da Harpa Cristã, não é necessária conexão com a internet para leitura (a conexão somente será necessária caso se deseje ouvir alguma canção da Harpa). Para ir para o índice da Harpa, acione o menu do aplicativo e selecione 'Harpa'. Trata-se da versão Almeida, totalmente corrigida e atualizada. Caso tenha gostado do aplicativo, deixe seus comentários e a nota. O aplicativo será atualizado constantemente, então envie sua sugestão para summtech.dev@gmail.com . Sobre Almeida: A tradução feita por João Ferreira de Almeida é considerada um marco na história da Bíblia em português porque foi a primeira tradução do Novo Testamento a partir das línguas originais. Anteriormente supõe-se que havia versões do Pentateuco traduzidas do hebraico. De acordo com esses registros, em 1642, aos 14 anos, João Ferreira de Almeida teria deixado Portugal para viver em Málaca (Malásia). Ele havia ingressado no protestantismo, vindo do catolicismo, e transferia-se com o objetivo de trabalhar na Igreja Reformada Holandesa local. Ele já conhecia a Vulgata, já que seu tio era padre. Após converter-se ao protestantismo aos 14 anos, Almeida partiu para a Batávia. Aos 16 anos traduziu um resumo dos evangelhos do espanhol para o português, que nunca chegou a ser publicado. Em Malaca traduziu partes do Novo Testamento também do espanhol. Aos 17, traduziu o Novo Testamento do latim, da versão de Theodore Beza, além de ter se apoiado nas versões italiana, francesa e espanhola. Aos 35 anos, iniciou a tradução a partir de obras escritas no idioma original, embora seja um mistério como ele aprendeu estes idiomas. Usou como base o Texto Massorético para o Antigo Testamento e uma edição de 1633 (pelos irmãos Elzevir) do Textus Receptus. Utilizou também traduções da época, como a castelhana Reina-Valera. A tradução do Novo Testamento ficou pronta em 1676. O texto foi enviado para a Holanda para revisão. O processo de revisão durou 5 anos, sendo publicado em 1681, após terem sido feitas mais de mil modificações[carece de fontes]. A razão é que os revisores holandeses queriam harmonizar a tradução com a versão holandesa publicada em 1637. A Companhia das Índias Orientais ordenou que se recolhesse e destruísse os exemplares defeituosos. Os que foram salvos foram corrigidos e utilizados em igrejas protestantes no Oriente, sendo que um deles está exposto no Museu Britânico. O próprio Almeida revisou o texto durante dez anos, sendo publicado após a sua morte, em 1693. Enquanto revisava, trabalhava também no Antigo Testamento. O Pentateuco ficou pronto em 1683. Há uma tradução dos Salmos que foi publicada em 1695, anexo ao Livro de Oração Comum, anônima, mas atribuída a Almeida. Almeida conseguiu traduzir até Ezequiel 48:12 em 1691, ano de sua morte, tendo Jacobus op den Akker completado a tradução em 1694. A tradução completa, após muitas revisões, foi publicada em dois volumes, um 1748, revisado pelo próprio den Akker e por Cristóvão Teodósio Walther, e outro em 1753. Em 1819, a Sociedade Bíblica Britânica e Estrangeira publica uma 3ª edição da Bíblia completa, em um volume. Há também as edições impressas em na colônia dinamarquesa de Tranquebar, que datam de 1719 a 1765. São edições parciais da Bíblia, que foram obtidas à medida que os revisores terminavam seu trabalho. Offline version without ads and the Bible and Christian Harp is not required internet connection for reading (the connection is only necessary if you want to hear some song Harp). To go to the index of the Harp, activate the application menu and select 'Harp'. It is the King James Version, fully patched and updated. If you enjoyed the app, leave your comments and notes. The app will be updated constantly, so please send your suggestion to summtech.dev @ gmail.com. About Almeida: Translation made by João Ferreira de Almeida is considered a milestone in the history of the Bible in Portuguese because it was the first translation of the New Testament from the original languages. Previously assumed that there were versions translated from the Hebrew Pentateuch. According to these records, in 1642, at age 14, King James would have left Portugal to live in Malacca (Malaysia). He had joined in Protestantism, Catholicism coming from, and transferred with the goal of working in the Dutch Reformed Church site. He already knew the Vulgate, as his uncle was a priest. After converting to Protestantism at age 14, Almeida left for Batavia. At 16 a summary of the Gospels translated from Spanish to Portuguese, which was never published. In Malacca translated parts of the New Testament also Spanish. At 17, he translated the New Testament from the Latin version of Theodore Beza, and has relied on versions Italian, French and Spanish. At 35, started from the translation of works written in the original language, although it is a mystery how he learned these languages. Used based on the Masoretic Text for the Old Testament, and an edition of 1633 (the Elzevir brothers) of the Textus Receptus. Also used translations of the season, as the Castilian Reina-Valera. The translation of the New Testament was completed in 1676. The text was sent to the Netherlands for review. The review process lasted five years, being published in 1681, after having been made over a thousand changes [citation needed]. The reason is that the reviewers wanted to harmonize the Dutch translation with the Dutch version published in 1637. The East India Company commanded to collect and destroy copies defective. Those who were saved were fixed and used in Protestant churches in the East, one of which is on display at the British Museum. Almeida himself revised the text for ten years, being published after his death in 1693. While revisava, also worked in the Old Testament. The Pentateuch was completed in 1683. There is a translation of the Psalms which was published in 1695, annexed to the Book of Common Prayer, anonymously, but attributed to Almeida. Almeida could translate to Ezekiel 48:12 in 1691, the year of his death, having Jacobus op den Akker completed the translation in 1694. The complete translation, after many revisions, was published in two volumes, one in 1748, revised by the den Akker and Christopher Theodosius Walther, and another in 1753. In 1819, the British and Foreign Bible Society published the 3rd edition of the complete Bible in one volume. There are also editions printed in the Danish colony of Tranquebar, dating from 1719 to 1765. Are partial editions of the Bible, which were obtained as the auditors finished their work.

description: MOM'S HELP Este aplicativo foi desenvolvido para auxiliar não apenas as mães, mas também toda a família. Por isso, separamos dicas de profissionais e cuidados importantes para os pequenos, além de ferramentas muito úteis para o monitoramento da saúde deles, como o controle de vacinas e medicamentos, controle médico, diário do bebê e muito mais. O Mom’s Help é dividido em 6 tópicos principais e seus respectivos sub-links: 1) Filhos (Cadastro de Filho, Diário do Bebê, Álbum de fotos, Registro de Altura e Peso, Resultado de Exames). 2) Saúde ( Controle de Consultas, Controle de Remédios, Calendário de Vacinas e Dentição). No controle de consultas e de remédios têm uma ferramenta muito útil: o ALARME. 3) Alimentação (Amamentação, Alimentação- Filho e Mamãe) 4) Sono (Sono da criança, Distúrbios do Sono) 5) Dicas ( Nesta parte as dicas são de especialistas, não são trocas de informações entre mamães – como um bate-papo. São textos objetivos e com conteúdo elaborados por profissionais). 6) Parceiros Disponível para Android, em breve para IOS. MOM'S HELP This application was developed to assist not only mothers, but also the entire family. Therefore, separate professional tips and important for small care in addition to very useful tools for monitoring their health, such as control of vaccines and medicines, medical control, daily baby and more. Mom's Help is divided into 6 main topics and their sub-links: 1) Children (Register of Child, Baby Album, Photo Album, Record Height and Weight, Results of Examinations). 2) Health (Control Consultation, Control of Medicines, Vaccines and Teething Calendar). In control consultations and medicines have a very useful tool: the ALARM. 3) Food (Breastfeeding, Food and Mommy-Son) 4) Sleep (child sleep, Sleep Disorders) 5) Tips (In this part of the tips are from experts, there are exchanges of information between moms - like a chat with The objectives and content produced by professionals) texts.. 6) Partners Available for Android, coming soon to iOS.

Monster Cube is a wild new match three game that opts out from the normal 2D game grid into a wild 3D cube made out of smaller different colored cube shaped monsters! It’s your job to pull them out one at a time, re-arrange them to connect three in any direction, and boom! Destroy as many cubes in a row before time runs out to get the most points possible. Experience Monster Cube Madness! Monster Cube includes: ● Dozens of fun unique missions. ● Combos, Point boosters, and Fever Modes to tap into to pump up your score to epic levels. ● Interactive online leaderboards ● A Facebook Page where you can see the weekly highscore from players of all over the world and an awesome Hall of Fame. Check out from which platform gamers are playing and which of both is racking up the highest score! The countdown is on. The monsters are all in and its up to you to pulverize them. The battlefield in Monster Cube is a vivid 3D cube layered 4 wide and 4 deep with rowdy multicolored cubic monsters, and its up to you to destroy as many of them as possible before time runs out. The controls are simple, if you want to wind around to see the Monster Cube from different angles simply swipe in the desired direction. Just tap on a cube to grab it, and tap again to put it where you want to. It's that simple. Get ready to discover the evolution of the match three game - it's Monster Cube and it's here now! Monster Cube is developed by Monster Juice.

Você já sabe o que preparar? O aplicativo Prato Cheio ajudará você a decidir o que de melhor pode preparar com o que tem em casa. Se você não possuir todos os ingredientes da receita sugerida, você pode facilmente: Criar uma lista de compras ou solicitar os ingredientes para seus amigos. Revenues indicated intelligently analyzing what you have ingredients at home. The recipe suggestions are made from selected ingredients and their local time, this way we can indicate the best meals for your lunch, dinner, snack and others. If you do not have all the ingredients of the recipe suggested, you can easily: Create a shopping list for the ingredients or ask your friends. You can find several recipes by category: • Cakes and pastries; • Meats; • Poultry; • Fish and seafood; • Salads, sauces and accompaniments; • Soups; • Masses; • Beverages.

Ainda há uma opção para favoritar linhas de ônibus, para acessar a localização do veículo de maneira ainda mais rápida. Soldier, you have been drafted to fly the most hardcore helicopters from all military forces. The entire world is under attack and your duty is to save the Earth from doom! So, welcome aboard, you’re now part of the Combat Helicopter Offensive Pacification Squad. Call it C.H.O.P.S.! When problems cannot be resolved on the ground, it is time for the air forces to join the battlefield. This is the moment that all of your years of hard training will be put at test. Will you be able to destroy all the enemies and save the day? Face many different types of aircrafts and helicopters and take all of them down before it is too late. Use various weapons and slugs to fight your way to the victory. Prove that you have nerves of steel and do not forget to avoid obstacles while piloting your chopper. UPGRADES AND CUSTOMIZATION In C.H.O.P.S. you earn coins every time you shoot down an enemy , so you can customize four different types of helicopters and upgrade your weapons. And believe me, soldier: you are going to need every little piece of help an upgrade can offer. WEAPONS Have a blast of fun with the Machine Gun, the Missile, the Laser, the Flamethrower and much more! Upgrade them up to 12 times to make them stronger and virtually unbeatable! ORBITOIDS Dreadful drones will help you fire and defeat the enemies willing to take you out of combat. Combine them with your weapons and increase your fire power and decrease your chances of sending home a KIA -- killed in action -- notice. HIGHLIGHTS • XP: After every match you gain combat experience to level up your weapons and orbitoids • Classic gameplay: tap and hold the screen to go up and release to go down • Retro & old school design: relive the amazing and classic action of side-scrolling pixel art games • Loads of enemy threats and challenges to beat • Endless gameplay: how far can you go without being destroyed? • Challenging tasks: take down as many mercenaries as you can Buckle up and dominate the sky to master the world’s most advanced combat aircraft machine! Download now C.H.O.P.S. and enjoy the most exciting action packed side-scrolling helicopter game. Are you ready to boom some enemies, soldier? You had better be! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

FULL VERSION with 45 top levels! Enjoy your free time with this top funny action, brain & puzzle game! Rope-Bot is a little, yet skilled, robot searching for his lost Golden Screws as he unveils the mystery of an abandoned factory. Join him as he breaks in through the many different and challenging puzzle levels of this fun and addicting top action and puzzle game. The game couldn’t be simpler: shoot, release and cut the rope while you swing our top little droid hero like a spider man. With beautiful graphics, simple dynamics and easy control, the game is sure to please you with hours of enjoyment. If you enjoy puzzles like Cut the Rope, Monkey Blast or Burn the Rope, you may like this physics game as well. Kids love it too! And new puzzle levels are already on the way! RopeBot Top Highlights: + Simple and fun, like games are meant to be! + Wonderful top quality graphics ★ A game developed by Tapps - Top Apps and Games Please note! You sit on it every day, but do you know what lies within the depths of your toilet when it is clogged? Sit tight and prepare yourself to play a game based on true discoveries directly from the annals of plumbing history. Find the long lost and wondrous objects from inside your toilet in Toilet Treasures! Grab your plunger and get ready: you’ll be amazed with what is inside of your toilet! Collect dozen of marvelous artifacts sunken in your toilet. As you complete each thematic collection, earn exquisite thematic plungers. Plus, can you find all the rare and legendary golden objects? Try Toilet Treasures now and live a realistic unclogging experience -- finally a game where you might actually learn something useful for life. HIGHLIGHTS • 60 bizarre objects to collect • Thematic plungers to unlock • Tasteful design • Feel like a real plumber • Based on a true story Download Toilet Treasures now and reflect upon the beauty hidden in the depths of everyday life. Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: Você está entediado e quer passar o tempo e se divertir com charadas? Que tal baixar este aplicativo Charadas? São várias piadas à sua disposição!!!! Falando nisso... - Qual o lugar em que todos podem sentar, menos você? - Tem coroa mas não é rei, tem raiz mas não é planta? Ficou curioso??? Então descubra as resposta à todas essas charadas baixando este aplicativo. Para ler as respostas de charada, aperte no botão "Ler Resposta" e para voltar à pergunta, pressione novamente o mesmo botão. Você gostou da charada e gostaria de compartilhar com seus amigos??? Basta clicar em "Compartilhar" e escolher a melhor forma de compartilhar. Você pode compartilhar via e-mail ou twitter, desde que o seu dispositivo Android possua suporte à esses aplicativos. ******** Nota Importante ******** No momento não é mais possível compartilhar a mensagem no Facebook devido à restrições de segurança imposta pelo site do Facebook. Desculpe-nos pelo transtorno. Assim que for possível contornar este problema, iremos fazer a atualização no aplicativo. ********************************* Não perca tempo e baixe já o aplicativo Charadas! Então baixe este aplicativo, pois foi feito especialmente para você!!!! :D Por favor, não esqueça avaliar e dar nota no Android Market. :) Todas as sugestões serão bem vindas. You liked the puzzle and would like to share with your friends?? Just click "Share" and choose the best way to share. You can share via email or twitter, from your Android device has to support these applications. Thus it is possible to circumvent this problem, we will upgrade the application. ********************************* Hurry up and download the app now Riddles! Attention: If you have no sense of humor and do not enjoy riddles, or download this application. Now ... if you enjoy riddles ... Then download this app, because it was made especially for you!! : D Please do not forget to rate and give notes on the Android Market. :) All suggestions are welcome.

Matérias disponíveis: Português - Matemática - História - Geografia - Física - Química - Inglês - Espanhol - Biologia - Filosofia - Sociologia Você que está estudando para o vestibular e/ou ENEM, a Papyrus Apps criou um novo aplicativo que irá ajudá-lo a cumprir seu tão sonhado objetivo: ingressar na universidade. O aplicativo é focado em questões do ENEM. Com ele, você poderá: 1) Estudar a qualquer hora e lugar. Basta ligar seu smartphone ou tablet e começar a fazer questões com gabarito. Assim, você não perderá mais tempo com trânsito ou em outras situações ociosas. 2) Crie simulados com as matérias que você desejar. 3) Interrompa o simulado no meio e comece de onde parou. 4) Ao final de cada simulado, o aplicativo mostra uma estatística de quantas questões você acertou e errou. Assim, você pode acompanhar seu progresso nos estudos facilmente e ver qual matéria você precisa se dedicar mais para passar no vestibular. Uma dica: Tenha sempre em mente que quanto mais questões você fizer, mais estará acostumado e familiarizado com a matéria e, consequentemente, mais perto da sua aprovação na faculdade. Palavras chave: ENEM, Vestibular, questões, provas, universidade, faculdade, simulados Materials available: Portuguese - Mathematics - History - Geography - Physics - Chemistry - English - Spanish - Biology - Philosophy - Sociology You who are studying for the exam and / or ENEM, Papyrus Apps created a new application that will help you meet your dreamed goal: go to college. The application is focused on ENEM issues. With it, you can: 1) Study anytime, anywhere. Just connect your smartphone or tablet and start making questions with feedback. Thus, you will not lose more time with traffic or other idle situations. 2) Create simulated with the materials you want. 3) Stop the dummy in the middle and start where you left off. 4) At the end of each simulated, the application shows a statistic of how many questions you hit and missed. So you can track your progress in studies and easily see which field you need to devote more to pass the entrance exam. A tip: Always keep in mind that the more questions you do, the more you used to and familiar with the matter and hence closer to approval in college. Keywords: ENEM, Vestibular, questions, tests, university, college, simulated
