description: Aplicativo da Receita Federal do Brasil destinado às Pessoas Físicas que recebem rendimentos de outra pessoa física ou do exterior e estejam sujeitas ao recolhimento mensal obrigatório (carnê-leão). As novidades na segunda versão são: a) inclusão do ano-calendário 2015; b) geração do DARF com os devidos acréscimos legais para pagamento após a data de vencimento; c) possibilidade de utilização da dedução com Livro Caixa; d) obrigatoriedade em informar o beneficiário do serviço nos rendimentos de determinadas categorias profissionais. O aplicativo permite: a) informar as ocorrências relacionadas à apuração do imposto devido no mês; b) fotografar e armazenar os comprovantes relativos às ocorrências registradas; c) gerar o documento de arrecadação (DARF) para pagamento na rede bancária; d) consultar os demonstrativos mensais e anual; e) exportar os dados informados para o IRPF 2015/2016. Application of Federal Revenue of Brazil intended for Individuals receiving income from another person or from abroad and are subject to mandatory monthly payment (booklet-lion). The new features in the second version are: a) inclusion of the calendar year 2015; b) generation DARF with the legal additional for payment after the due date; c) possibility of using deduction with Paper Box; d) the obligation to inform the recipient of the service in yields of certain professional categories.   The application allows: a) inform the occurrences related to the calculation of tax payable in the month; b) shoot and store vouchers relating to incidents recorded; c) generate the collection document (DARF) for payment in the banking network; d) refer to the monthly and annual statements; e) export data reported for the PIT 2015/2016.

Aplicativo da Receita Federal do Brasil destinado aos interessados no processo de IMPORTAÇÃO de mercadorias (importadores, despachantes aduaneiros, agentes de carga...). Essa primeira versão do aplicativo permite: a) consultar informações básicas sobre o Conhecimento de Carga e sobre a Declaração de Importação. b) acompanhar Conhecimento de Carga e Declaração de Importação e ser avisado (push service), automaticamente, quando houver mudança em sua situação. c) simular a importação de uma mercadoria, calculando os impostos devidos e informando o tratamento administrativo necessário à mportação. d) acessar a tabela de NCM (Nomeclatura Comercial do Mercosul) através de pesquisa por código, descrição ou estrutura e visualizar as alíquotas, as medidas compensatórias e o tratamento administrativo de cada produto consultado. e) consultar Dicas e realizar um teste de conhecimentos sobre o processo de importação de mercadorias f) avaliar a aplicação. Brazil's Federal Revenue application for those interested in the import of goods (importers, customs brokers, freight forwarders ...) process. This first version of the app allows you to: a) see basic information about the Bill of Lading and the Import Declaration. b) accompany Bill of Lading and Import Declaration and be warned (push service) automatically when a change in your situation. c) simulate the importation of goods, calculating taxes owed and stating the necessary administrative processing mportação. d) access the table of NCM (Mercosur Trade Naming) by searching by code, description, structure and view the rates, compensatory measures and administrative processing of each product consulted. e) consult Tips and perform a test of knowledge about the process of importing goods f) evaluate the application.

Brazilian Customs (RFB) APP for International Travellers. In addition, support for English language throughout the application, with a menu for easy access to the language change.
release_text: In this third version of the APP 'Viajantes' (Travellers): 1) The shortcut to access the mobile address of the Traveller's Electronic Declaration of Goods (e-DBV) was substituted by the functionality of offline declaration filling, transmission and generation of tax payment document. 2) A service is available in order to refer to the situation of a declaration delivered to the RFB (saved, transmitted and recorded). 3) A FAQ service is avaliable. 4) Creation of a language selection menu.

description: "Uli's Adventures" is not just a coloring game! It's a whole world, which a little snail inhabits. With one click you will have a ready-made pattern on the grass or the fence! That’s always nice and fun! The main character, Uli the snail, lives in a cozy little house, where you can arrange the furniture and decorate the interior using the points received in the game. You can develop memory and attention, while getting more points, when you color-match a provided pattern. All scenes in the game have animated objects. This coloring game is full of surprises, what makes it even more interesting for the child. The coloring game is full of sounds! Pleasant music will accompany the child on the journey. Расшифровщик кодов ошибок электронных систем автомобилей ЛАДА (Lada OBD). В программе содержится расшифровка диагностических кодов ошибок электронных систем автомобилей ЛАДА. В поле "код" необходимо вводить только цифры номера ошибки. Некоторые расшифровки кодов ошибок контроллера ЭСУД содержать также причины их возникновения. Специально для сайта 4pda.ru по просьбе Paguk Decryption error codes electronic systems LADA (Lada OBD). The program contains the transcript of diagnostic error codes electronic systems LADA. In the "code" to the numbers in the error number. Some decoding error codes ECM contain the reasons for their occurrence. Specifically for the site at the request of 4pda.ru Paguk

Main fatures: * Built-in English dictionaries * Player's custom dictionary feature * Single- and 2-player modes * Lightning-fast AI and custom screens Balda King Square a fun word puzzle game for Android featuring multiple dictionaries, player modes, and many other custom options. Drawing on inbuilt English dictionaries, the app's extremely fast AI searches through thousands of words less than in a half a second. You can also add any words not found in the main dictionaries using the user's custom dictionary feature. Play against your mobile device in single player mode or against your friend in two-player mode. You can customize the game's screen grid, choosing dimensions ranging from 4x4 up to 7x7. The game auto-saves your game progress, so you never lose your place. The basic principle of the game is the addition of one letter, so that each move should get a new finished word. Each of the next letter in the word is separated from the previous by one cell horizontally or vertically. Rules are as follows: 1. Before the game start program puts a random word(nominal, nominative, singular) on a square field with cells. The goal is to fill the entire field of characters. The player who records the longer words will get a larger number of points. 2. New words are obtained by adding just one letter in any neighboring cell of any recorded letters. For each letter of the newly formed word you will get a one point. 3. Using all available letters is not required but the letters chain which makes the word must be indivisible and disjoint. The same cell cannot be used twice in one move. 4. Do not use words that have already been drawn up during the game as well as word of the first move. Good luck!

KKC Barcode PRO 3.0 - это многофункциональный сканер штрих-кодов, удобный генератор QR кодов, надежный терминал сбора данных для мобильных устройств на базе Android. Поддержка планшетов. СКАНЕР ШТРИХ-КОДОВ Сканер распознает большинство популярных штрих-кодов, включая 1D, 2D. Работать со сканером штрих-кода KKC Barcode PRO одно удовольствие: * Отсканированные данные можно скопировать в буфер обмена, послать по SMS или E-mail или перейти к поиску в интернете. * Визитную карточку из 2D штрих-кода можно одним нажатием сохранить в телефонной книжке. * Отсканировав шрих-код, моментально набрать номер телефона или ввести адрес получателя в E-mail. Все отсканированные штрих-коды храняться в истории сканирования и доступны в любое время. ГЕНЕРАТОР QR КОДОВ Используя KKC Barcode Pro теперь вы сможете в несколько кликов создать QR код, содержащий различную информацию: контактные данные для телефонной книги, ссылка на сайт,адреса для отправки электронной почты и многое другое. После генерации штрихкода вы сможете сохранить его в формате .jpg или отправить через интернет. Для начала генерации QR-кода выберите раздел «Генерация штрих-кода» в главном меню приложения. ТЕРМИНАЛ СБОРА ДАННЫХ KKC Barcode PRO благодаря встроенной функции терминала сбора данных превращает мобильный телефон с Android в полноценный терминал сбора данных. Идеально подходит для проведения инвентаризации (переучета) товаров с использованием штрих-кода. Варианты использования терминала сбора данных: 1. Автономный вариант. С помощью приложения производится сканирование товаров с указанием количества. Результат инвентаризации можно сохранить в текстовом файле на карте памяти устройства и затем переслать для обработки по e-mail или bluetooth. 2. Сетевой вариант. Загрузка списка товаров с настольного компьютера через соединение WiFi. Выгрузка данных в настольное приложение через соединение Wi-Fi. Для связи с настольным компьютером необходимо использовать программу KKC Barcode PRO Server. Возможен экспорт результатов инвентаризации в Exel. Скачать настольное приложение, а также подробные инструкции по использованию и настройке можно на сайте производителя www.kkc.by в разделе «Программное обеспечение» / «Для терминалов сбора данных»/KKC Barcode PRO Android OS. KKC Barcode PRO 3.0 - is a multi-barcode scanner, QR code generator is a handy, reliable data collection terminal for mobile devices based on Android. Supports tablets. Barcode scanners The scanner recognizes the most popular barcodes including 1D, 2D. Work with barcode scanner KKC Barcode PRO is a pleasure: * The scanned data can be copied to the clipboard, send by SMS or E-mail or go to search on the Internet. * Business card from a 2D bar code can be stored in one-touch phone book. * Srih scanning the code, immediately dial a phone number or enter the recipient's address in the E-mail. All scanned barcodes are stored in the history of scan and are available at any time. QR CODE GENERATOR Using KKC Barcode Pro now you can with a few clicks to create a QR code that contains a variety of information: contact details for the phone book, a link to a website, the address for sending email and much more. After generating a barcode, you can save it as a .jpg or send via the Internet. To start generating QR-code, select the "Generate Barcode" in the main application menu. Data collection terminal KKC Barcode PRO thanks to built-in data collection terminal turns a mobile phone with Android in the full data collection terminal. Ideal for inventory (stocktaking) goods using a barcode. Variants of using a data collection terminal: 1. Stand-alone option. With the application scanned goods, indicating the number. The result of the inventory can be saved in a text file on the memory card device and then forwarded for processing by e-mail or bluetooth. 2. Network option. Download the list of products from the desktop through the connection WiFi. Uploading data to the desktop application through the connection Wi-Fi. To communicate with a desktop PC must use the KKC Barcode PRO Server. Export is possible inventory results in Exel. Download the desktop application as well as detailed instructions on how to use and configure, please visit the manufacturer www.kkc.by in the "Software" / "For data collection terminals» / KKC Barcode PRO Android OS.
release_text: - Добавлена функция создания собственных QR-кодов, возможность их сохранения или отправки. - Добавлена возможность включения мгновенного поиска товара в интернете после сканирования штрих-кода. - Добавлена поддержка планшетов.

description: Pastee Droid is an Android client for "the secure pastebin" Pastee! Supports Paste encryption. If encryption is selected pastes are encrypted (AES-256) with a password. A SHA-256 hash of the password is stored in the database, not the passphrase itself, which ensures that only those who know the password will be able to view the content of your paste. All traffic is sent over SSL Supports over 100 languages. Languages are listed in order of common (C, Java , Text Only, etc) , other (ActionScript, Debian Source File, etc ) and combo (XML+Ruby , HTML+Django/jinja, etc) . Supports pastes of up to 200,000 characters Pastes are not listed. Pastee assures users that it will never list or index your pastes for any reason. Privacy and security are essential to Pastee. Paste IDs are carefully chosen , this makes them less susceptible to crawling bots. Paste ID's are short and easy to remember if you must. Pastee Droid supports sharing of pastes via various apps such as twitter , text message , email etc. Pastee Droid also supports URL-shortening .Just paste a URL and it will be shortened . Pastes have reasonable expire times. An hour , a day , a week , a month and a year. For more information on Pastee see https://pastee.org/about "Pastee Droid" is copyrighted by Technologique Park "Pastee" is copyrighted by Pastee The Pastee Droid Logo is a modification based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License. Original can be found at http://www.android.com/developers/branding.html

deciBel is the result of a serious effort to make an Android based SPL meter as close to a professional-grade device as the phone hardware limitations allow. It uses a Fast Fourier Transform algorithm to implement a high precision A weighting filter and sophisticated digital signal processing techniques to achieve the best possible SPL readings out of your Android phone or tablet. It displays the current, maximum and minimum values in decibels, and generates 3 kinds of sound pressure level versus time charts. The display can be turned upside down to allow pointing the mic at the sound source. deciBel is supported by ads. ### Please calibrate before the first use! ### Features: - true A-Weighting (ANSI S1.4) - simple calibration interface - numeric dB, dBmin and dBmax display - sliding sound level versus time chart - sliding max, min and average soud level versus time chart - accumulated sound level exposition chart (dosimeter) - saves chart screen shots to the SD card - dominant frequency display - 22Khz bandwidth at the input of the weighting filter - 1024 point real time FFT and digital sound processing - movable to the SD card
release_text: Notification area icon added Performance improvements User interface improvements

"Birds of prey are birds that hunt for food primarily via flight, using their keen senses, especially vision. They are defined as birds that primarily hunt vertebrates, including other birds. Their talons and beaks tend to be relatively large, powerful and adapted for tearing flesh. The term "raptor" is derived from the Latin word rapere (meaning to seize or take by force). Because of their predatory lifestyle, often at the top of the food chain, they face distinct conservation concerns." Explore the wonderful world of the Birds of Prey. Discover the many eagles, falcons, harriers, vultures, hawks, buzzards, kites and osprey and learn what sets them apart, what they eat, and where they live. Bird of Prey calls and songs are included with most profiles, and you can flip through a growing photo album. Birds of Prey will be updated regularly to include the many different members of this wonderful grouping.
Kid-friendly whack-a-mole-like game play to test reaction times. Score is median of reaction times (smaller is better), and statistics are saved to csv files after each game.

description: ** Important: As much as I'd like, some applications I cannot seem to add support for, such as WhatsApp. Please contact them and ask them to add support for 3rd party apps like mine, thank you! If there is an app you'd like added, email me and I'll see if I can :) Message Center Plus is an extremely customizable Widget for displaying Notification Alerts. It supports Missed Calls, EMail (via K9), GMail (via K9), Missed Text Messages (SMS Messages), and upcoming Calendar Appointments! If your using Android 4.2 or higher you can also add this Widget to your Lockscreen! Several icon themes are included, but you can also make use of any existing Application Icons as well, or even Contact Photos of who sent you that Text Message or Called You! Choose your colors, background, and which notifications you want. You can even use Filters! Please Contact me with any issues or suggestions you may have, and please try the free Message Center Widget also in the market before buying to ensure this is what your looking for. The free version only includes the "Classic" Widget Style. NOTE: For GMail notifications you either have to use a version of GMail prior to 2.3.5 OR use K9/Kaiten for notifications - this is explained in the Help part of the Widgets configuration. You can also email me if you have any questions on this. To force a refresh of unread count you can double tap on the widget. Note if your phone is busy doing other options it may take a bit to register the click nothing I can do about that. This has been tested on 2.1 - 4.0 on Acer Liquid E, Droid X, Samsung Galaxy S, Asus Transformer and other devices. I cannot respond to comments posted below, if you have issues PLEASE send me an email or contact me on Twitter @CS_Studio. Actively working on implementing additional suggestions, if you have more feel free to submit them!

Harbour View is a site-specific audio/visual exhibition created by sound artist Chris Driedzic and photographer Graham Kennedy. Guided by your smartphone, this app takes the user on a 45-minute tour of downtown St. John's, Newfoundland, Canada. The app leads the user to points on the map where the view of the St. John's harbour has been obstructed by urban development. Once arriving at these points the app plays a multimedia work which combines stop-motion photography and sound collage to capture the intangible beauty of the John's harbour. Harbour View promotes reflection on the impact and meaning of progress. It asks the user to consider: What sights and sounds of the St. John’s harbour have been lost to development? How does our romanticized notion of historic spaces affect our views of urban growth? Is there a clash between this idea of the picturesque and the actual function of a working harbour?

Stop driving in circles, avoid parking tickets, head directly to the right street! Find a free parking in the nearest residential street when driving in Montreal. An Open Source project done in collaboration with Montréal Ouvert. Github: https://github.com/mudar/ParkCatcher Park Catcher is powered by The City of Montreal Open Data Portal, in compliance with its Open Data license. Data source: http://donnees.ville.montreal.qc.ca/fiche/stationnement-rue/ Data Licence: http://donnees.ville.montreal.qc.ca/licence-texte-complet Using the map - The interactive map and the search engine allow you to find spots where parking is allowed for the time period you need. - Tap on a parking post, displayed in green, to display the next no-parking period in that area. - Zones where parking is forbidden are hidden from the map. - Tap the date at the screen bottom to select the time period for which you need a parking spot.
release_text: - Small changes: layout, navigation and Material Design guidelines. - Minor bug fixes and compatibility issues (Gingerbread to Lollipop). - Next update will contain Parking 2015 data!

description: Do you know that San Francisco, Los Angeles and Toronto have transit service trackable online via NextBus.com? If so, you've got to the right app. All features you really need are in one place, right here! With our Ultimate NextBus Tracker, your buses are in your hand! The screenshots will tell you everything described below. In addition, Bay Area Rapid Transit(BART) is also available! FEATURES: ✓ Serves 40 public transit systems: San Francisco Muni, Toronto Transit Commission, Los Angeles Metro, MBTA, AC Transit, California University of Pennsylvania, Camarillo Area (CAT), Chapel Hill Transit, Charles River TMA - EZRide, Charm City Circulator, City of Oxford, Collegetown Shuttle, DC Circulator, Downtown Connection, Emery-Go-Round, Georgia College, Glendale Beeline, Gold Coast Transit, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Moorpark Transit, , NYC MTA - Staten Island, North County Transit District, Pensacola Beach (SRIA), Portland Streetcar, RTC RIDE, Reno, Radford Transit, Roosevelt Island, Rutgers Univ. Newark College Town Shuttle, Rutgers University, Seattle Streetcar, Simi Valley (SVT), Societe de transport de Laval, Temple University, Thousand Oaks Transit (TOT), Unitrans ASUCD/City of Davis, University of Maryland, Ventura Intercity (VISTA), Western Kentucky University, York College. system ✓ Transit can be seamlessly interchangeable. Requires no refresh or reset at all. ✓ Get real-time bus arrival / departure predictions by any route, direction, stop name and stop ID within just 3 touches. ✓ Check all vehicles' current locations on your toute. ✓ Add a stop to your favorites without any confusion, and even create a shortcut on your Home screen. ✓ Set an alarm so that it reminds you of the current location of the bus. ✓ Check the exact location of the bus on the map. You can also intuitively check other buses and bus stops together at once! ✓ In your favorites, you can not only save a bus stop but also a pair of route and bus stop. Now you can get exactly what you want! ✓ Find nearby stops based on your location. Within just 2 touches, you can find when the bus will arrive at that stop. StreetView will be there to show the surrounding view of that bus stop. ✓ Predictions will automatically updated. You can set the refresh interval on your own. ✓ Full support for devices from Ginger Bread(2.3.3) to Jelly Bean(4.1), including tablets. .... and many more cool features you can easily understand. This app is designed to provide predictions as clearly and simply as possible within a few number of touches. You will love it! Disclaimer: This app has no affiliation with NextBus.com. Pro vs. Lite: - Unlimited number of tracks you can save - Viewing all buses for a particular route on the map - Displaying as many predictions as possible - Auto refresh and Manual refresh - Full featured nearby stop search

description: CCTV Design Tool is new and will be rapidly updated soon to include floor map imports, and FOV selectors using trigonometric routines and displays. You can use the current utilities to calculate any HD IP CCTV item that you need from lens selection and IR illumination calculating to storage, bandwidth and RAID storage calculating. This is the free version which allows you to use all of the CCTV design calculators. You cannot create a project or scenes with this version, you need to purchase the full version for that. This app includes these calculators/utilities: > lens calculator > storage calculator > bandwidth calculator > ohms law & power calculator > voltage drop calculator > conduit fill calculator (per NECA) > RAID storage calculator > IR illuminator light distance calculator > Ping test tool > Camera Connect tool This app also includes RJ45 terminations and pinout diagrams. Please leave notes, comments or suggestions on what other calculators you might want to see added, or changed to make them more useful.
release_text: > Added camera resolution selector > Corrected a minor metric conversion error > Added CCTV lens calculator. > Fixed some text color issues on some tablets > Added Ping Test and Camera-Connect tools > Fixed a problem with panel heights on some devices. > Added ability for username/password when connecting to a camera > Added better support for landscape mode and tablets

description: Blue Neon Clocks This is a clock widget not an app, it is under widgets not apps A collection of 10 blue neon clocks This is a variety of clocks based on a blue neon theme. This should go good with any blue theme you might have on your phone or just want a blue neon clock. All clocks come in three sizes 2x2 3x3 4x4 (this makes it 30 clocks in total) All clocks come with the standard alarm settings. I made a variety of different layouts. Gears, Open Sign, Don't Worry Be Happy, plus a lot more. Instructions to install it: go to your home screen; press and hold the finger on the screen of the screen; select "Widgets"; in the next menu select the clock you want and the size (sizes are in brackets). If you have a launcher that allows it, you can re-size the image also. If you have any questions feel free to email me or leave a message on the developer site. Portions of this work are modifications based on work created and shared by Google ( http://www.android.com/developers/branding.html ) and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License ( http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) . analog clock

(Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ca.utoronto.mobilemap&hl=en, market://details?id=ca.utoronto.mobilemap) This Google-based, layered map designed for the Android helps members of the U of T community, particularly people who are new to the campus, navigate using meaningful search words, such as "library" and "registrar". The first map layers include accessibility, food, wireless, student services (including registrars), car parking, bike racks, TTC subway stations, green sites (including green roofs and battery drop-off sites), safety, study spaces and washrooms. It is a living map, one that will develop more layers as it grows.

description: Aprender a Leer es la aplicación ideal para que los niños de primaria aprendan a leer, conocer el abecedario y aprender fácilmente y de una forma divertida en su educacion la gramática. La lectura no es un juego pero tus hijos podrán aprender a leer de manera entretenida e interactiva con Aprender a Leer. Consta de cuatro apartados para educar a los niños en el mundo de la lectura: - Introducción a la Lectura, donde se educa la construcción de las sílabas para aprender a leer. - Vocabulario. Con distintas secciones que se irán completando: Aprender a leer como se escriben los diferentes Animales, Aprender a leer como se escriben las Prendas de vestir, Aprender a leer como se escriben las Formas, Aprender a leer como se escriben los Instrumentos musicales, etc. - Reglas ortográficas. Una herramienta necesaria en la educacion para aprender a leer y escribir de manera eficaz. Gracias de antemano del equipo C&C - Carrión Castillo Learn to Read is the ideal medium for primary school children learn to read application, knowing the alphabet and easy and a fun way to learn grammar in their education. Reading is not a game but your children can learn to read entertaining and interactive way to learn to read. It consists of four sections to educate children in the world of reading: - Introduction to Reading, where the construction of the syllables are trained to learn to read. - Vocabulary. With different sections will be completed: Learning to read as different Animals are written, Learning to read as written Clothing, Learning to read and Forms are written, Learning to read like musical instruments are written, etc. - Spelling rules. A necessary tool in education for learning to read and write effectively. Thanks in advance team C & C - Carrion Castillo

description: Pipe Friction Factor allows the user to calculate the friction factor for pipes or ductwork by providing the Reynolds number (turbulent flow only) and the relative roughness of the pipe. The program then solves the Colebrook equation for the friction factor. No more staring at Moody Diagrams thanks to Pipe Friction Factor! The algorithm used for solving the Colebrook equation is based, in part, on "Solving for Friction Factor", ASHRAE Journal, vol. 45, no. 7, p. 41-44.

The new image viewer plus the unique Full Screen Option: you can see your photos in full screen, without the annoying stripes on the sides. This application resizes your photos without distorting them: much more than a standard image viewer! Please do LIKE on Facebook, +1 on Google Plus, write a review on Google Play and share Full Screen Pic. Thanks for the support. Main functions: .viewing Pics faster than the standard Gallery and other popular App... .the Full Screen Option can be disabled so you can use the App as a Standard Image Viewer .KITKAT Immersive Mode for devices with software keys (Hide navigation Bar for Full Screen Pics) .ability to set the Wallpaper of the Home Screen with the Full Screen Pic, you can also enlarge the Pic to fit the screen size; process WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) is used .3 Widgets (2x1, 3x2 and 4x3) that you can add to home screen and configure with independent pics & actions .easy toggle pic size with double tap .ability to add your favorite folders excluding those that contain unwanted images .thumbnails navigation .open last viewed folder .View in Map" to Start Google Maps and Google Earth by Coordinates or close Address .view File information, ExIf data and GPS tags and Copy to Clipboard .slide show .share pics with friends .sort filelist in various ways, also by ExIf Camera Data .clear History of viewed folders .many configuration options To deepen: In still camera photography, the most common aspect ratios are 4:3 and 3:2, closer to a square shape and suitable for printing. However, many mobile devices, tablets, laptops, desktop monitors and TVs have an aspect ratio of 16:9 or 16:10, closer to a rectangular shape and suitable for movies. When 4:3 or 3:2 images are displayed on a 16:9 or 16:10 device, two stips are shown on the sides of the screen and the image remains smaller. This App solves the problem by adapting the image to the size of the screen. Of course, the top and the bottom of the image are slightly cut, but in most cases this is not a big problem and you can however see the original image with a double tap. In case of photos of people where may be cut off heads or feet, you could turn off the full screen display and use the app as a regular photo viewer. If your device supports it, you can connect it to the TV with an HDMI cable and enjoy your pictures in Full Screen. Of course some mobile devices can be set to take pictures in 16:9 format but this format is not suitable for printing and does not use the sensor completely (less megapixels) so this is not a good solution. The Lite version is limited to 15 consecutive Full Screen Pics and is made in order to evaluate the innovative feature of the App. To remove this limit you need to get the PRO version; all other functions are active and complete, then you can then use it as a fast picture viewer TAGS: Picture Viewer, Image Viewer, Photo Viewer,ExIf, Slide show, Share Photo, GPS, Google Maps, Google Earth, Gallery
release_text: News: Added "Status Bar Color" Option Added Contest Menu "Jump to Top" & "Jump to Bottom" Improvements: Folders are Sorted by "Last View Pic" by default Files are Sorted by "File Time Descending" by default "Theme" Option replaced by "Background Color" Option Graphical improvements Fixed ScrollBar not visible with Lollipop "Flat Title Bar and Black Splash Screen" Option has been removed Minor bug fix

description: "Stockfish Chess" is an Android port of the famous chess engine "Stockfish 4". You need a graphical user interface for playing against this engine. Please download the application "Chess for All" from "Google Play Store".
release_text: Source code released on GitHub. IDE: Conversion of Eclipse on Android Studio.

description: Play chess against an engine or use the program as a PGN editor/-viewer. Engine Play: This program is using a chess engine as a service. Please download an engine from the "Google Play Store" for playing against an engine. The following engines are supported: * Stockfish Chess * Chess Engines "Chess for All" features: * play against an engine * support of two chess engines * automatic engine play * analyze mode * show engine thinking * polyglot opening book * two player mode * load/save/edit games * delete PGN-files * edit PGN tags * own PGN database with search for player, event and opening * PGN download (web) * clipboard: copy/paste * PGN-Viewer * graphical setup board * four different chess board and pieces * time control(game clock, move time, sand glass) * one touch moves * undo moves * full Chess960 support * sound effects * option to keep the screen on while playing * enable/disable status bar * user manual (web) * free, GPLv3 Please contact the developer if you have questions or issues, before rating the app low. With an e-mail you can reach the developers directly: select "Menu", "About" and "Contact".

Die AAGL App liefert Abfahrtszeiten von allen öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln im TNW direkt auf Ihr Smartphone. Die App ist einfach zu bedienen und bietet unterwegs einen echten Mehrwert. Besonders an Haltestellen die nicht mit digitalen Fahrgastinformationsbildschirmen ausgerüstet sind, können sich Fahrgäste so jederzeit über die nächsten Abfahrten informieren. Funktionen: - Abfahrtsplan inkl. Nachtfahrplan sämtlicher Transportunternehmen im TNW - Anzeige von Realtime (RT) Abfahrtszeiten für die Busse der AAGL und BLT - „Locate Me“- Funktion zur Bestimmung der Haltestellen in Ihrer Nähe - Anzeige möglicher Umsteigehaltestellen mit Abfahrtszeiten - Verwaltung der Fahrpläne innerhalb der App - Ohne Verbindung zum Mobilfunknetz werden die Fahrplanzeiten angegeben - Liste der vom Benutzer gespeicherten Favoriten - Einfaches Umstellen zwischen Wartezeit und Abfahrtszeit The AAGL app provides departure times of all public transport in the TNW directly to your smartphone. The app is easy to use and the road offers a real added value. Particularly at bus stops which are not equipped with digital passenger information screens, passengers can be at all times informed of the next departures. Functions: - Exit plan including night services all transport companies in TNW - Display of real-time (RT) times for the buses of the AAGL and BLT - "Locate Me" - function for determining the stops in your area - Indication of possible interchange points with departure times - Management of schedules within the app - No connection to the network, the schedule times are specified - List of saved by the user favorites - Lets you easily switch between waiting time and departure time

description: Cook Droid Recipes is your personal Cook Book everywhere and anywhere. It contains thousands of recipes clearly structured in multiple categories (including by meal and by origin). Beside containing a huge list of english recipes, you can easily switch to your desired language: English, German, French and Italian! (Just switch it in the preferences) Due to Cook Droid's direct access to the *.wikibooks.org database, you'll have always an updated list of the recipes available there. Not committed yet? Maybe the following features will do that: - Multiple color themes: green, blue, pink, violet, yellow and dark (checkout the preferences) - Print recipes using Google Cloud Print - Smartphone and tablet compatible (of course with device specific layouts ;)) - Search function over the whole index - Listing by origin - Listing by meal (appetizer, breakfast, dessert, holiday), depends on selected language - Random recipes with endless scrolling (only in English Version) - Favorites management (favorites will be stored for instant access even without an internet connection) - Share your recipes (by E-Mail or by any Messaging-Service of your choice) - Recipe search by ingredients (only in English Version) - Links referring to *.wikibooks.org can be directly opened within this app - Export and Import/Synchronization functionallity for your favorites (useful in combination with services like dropbox :)) - Local caching of categories to improve the application speed (can be disabled in the preferences) Tested on: - Asus Transformer Prime (Ice Cream Sandwich) - Samsung/Google Galaxy Nexus (Ice Cream Sandwich) Notes: - All recipes come from en.wikibooks.org (or the equivalent in the specific language) - During the recipe selection is an internet connection required (as long as the category hasn't been cached) Rights: - INTERNET & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used for online requests of the recipes. - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Offline-Storage for the favorites and the local cache All recipes are available under the Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License (or its equivalent in the proper language) http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ Tags: Cooking, baking, cookbook, recipes, dishes, drinks, cakes, desserts, kitchen, CookDroid, cocktails, grill, international, honeycomb, tablet, delicious
release_text: Changed root category Now you have more categories to select from :)

description: A game targeted to all highscore fans. Let the pearl jump over the walls and collect points. But be cautious: Jumping to high will result in a crash, jumping to low or touching a wall and your pearl shatters. (Perfect: Jump through the blue shine.). No master has fallen from the sky, so keep... trying, trying, trying. After successfully conquer 10 walls you'll face a box marked with a question mark. Smash it and score 10 extra points. Eat all the letters of the word "PEARL" by touching the word or a single letter. After you made this challenge you'll receive a total of 100 extra points! Where's your highscore in the worldwide ranking? Just find out and download this free game now. Features: - 3D-Styled side-scrolling game - Cool sound effects - Stunning explosions - Worldwide highscore ranking - Playable in both landscape and portrait orientation Quick Guide: - Hold your finger on the screen to charge the jump force and quickly release it to jump - Jump through the transparent blue boxes in order to continue playing (missing them will make you lose) - Try to collect the special items to boost your score Compatibility - Phones (Tested on Nexus 5, Galaxy Nexus, Samsung Galaxy S3) - Tablets (Tested on Asus Transformer Prime, Nexus 7) Permissions - Internet access: required to load and publish your highscores Tags Sidescroller, side, scroller, 3D, 3-D, game, play, fun, hard, difficult, highscores, ranking, unity, addicting, skill, experience, challenging, jumping, ball, effects
release_text: Fixed bug that a crash is possibly not being detected. Fixed jump effect animation.

description: Experience game fun just like in the eighties. Deal with aliens, dodge asteroids or shoot them out of space. Collect points and achieve the highscore, collect achievements and show all, that you are the best. But pay attention... Your fuel is decreasing quickly. You have to collect the energy rings to keep your shuttle flying. Over the top, the speed of the game will be increased constantly and you will not have enough time to destroy everything which is blocking your way. Experience the good old eighties arcade game feeling and get the highscore (personally and world-wide) in different categories. Features - Arcade feeling just like in the good old days - Exciting and funny achievements to unlock - Three different leadboards in which you can challenge your friends and the best of the world Notes about Google Play Game Services - Achievements and Leaderboards are disabled by default (because of the required permissions) - Enable them by clicking on the button "Stats Off" in the top left corner and authorize this app to use the Google Play Game Servies Tested on - Smartphone: Galaxy Nexus, Nexus 5 - Tablet: Asus Transformer Prime, Nexus 7 Tags Explosions, Arcade, Leaderboards, Achievements, Shooting, Laser, Aliens, UFOs, Space, Spaceship, Sidescroller, 2D, Hunter, Skill, Challenging, Hard, Difficult, Fun, Entertaining, Exciting, Interesting, Addicting, Planets, Stars, Cruising, Flying, Invader

Hashi is a logic puzzle. Connect islands by horizontal and vertical single or double bridges such that in the end, all islands are connected with the indicated number. Note that bridges may not cross other bridges or go over islands. Note that the solution is always unique. You can get hints when stuck. Different sizes can be played and some further properties of the puzzles may be customized. Now there is also an expert mode where triple bridges are possible. You may choose between two color schemes (white on black or black on white).
release_text: New menu / settings dialog Sound volume can be adjusted Minor bug fixes (and sorry about the shameful 2012-02-28 version).

description: Die Supercard App macht das Profitieren noch bequemer. Sobald Sie sich in der App mit Ihrer Supercard Nummer und der PIN* angemeldet haben, haben Sie Ihren Supercard Barcode immer dabei. Damit können Sie direkt Punkte sammeln und einlösen. Bei Ihrem nächsten Einkauf in den Coop Verkaufsstellen** zeigen Sie einfach per Smartphone den Supercard Barcode an der Kasse vor. Auch können Sie mit der App digitale Bons ganz bequem von unterwegs aktivieren und auf Ihre Supercard laden. Durch vorzeigen Ihrer Supercard können die Rabattbons schon beim nächsten Einkauf eingelöst werden. Die Supercard App steht Ihnen in drei Sprachen (DE, FR, IT) zur Verfügung. Craving Chinese, Indian, Italian or Greek food? You'll be spoilt for choice! Restaurants usually take 30-45 minutes to deliver. Switch to Dutch, English, French or German anytime. ✔ Log in with an existing account or create a new one. ✔ Addresses: all your saved addresses will be available in the app for your next order. ✔ Reorder: choose an order from your order history and reorder in no time. ✔ Widget: all of your favourite restaurants in one widget on your start screen. We are constantly improving: Loving it? Leave a review! The Lieferservice.ch Android app has regular updates and new features. Do you have tips, ideas or any other feedback for our app? description: *** Calculate Chemical Formula From Exact Mass *** This app calculates the chemical formula from exact mass measured in mass spectrometry. It requires the input of the monoisotopic mass, its charge and the ionizing molecule. The chemical formula calculation supports the elements C H N O P S (carbon, hydrogen, nitrogen, oxygen, phosphorus and sulfur) with a maximal content of 1 single P or S. Thus the app is suited for instant identification of metabolites (small molecules) in non-targeted (open) metabolomics approaches using mass spec. Positively charged ions with different adducts and with a maximal mass of 500 Da are supported (bigger masses are hard to identify and require much more calculation time). The chemical formula is automatically checked for even electron content and mass distribution for the different elements. Whether matching formulas are common chemicals can be checked by following the rpvided link to PubChem from NCBI.

The Hexagon Election Campaign Game Spend money to win elections: The game world is made up of hexagonal areas. An area can be empty or belong to either one of the RED or the BLUE party. Each party can spend money (hexabucks) on hexagons to influence them. The computer announces how many hexabucks can be spent in the next round. The player chooses on which hexagon he or she wants to spend them. (a) On an empty hexagon, the value of this hexagon will be the sum of hexabucks spent. The campaign will influence each of the up to six neighboring hexagons: (a1) if empty, it will be converted to the color of the player, with a value of 1 (a2) if of the same color as the player, it will increase its value by 1 (a3) if of the opposite color, will decrease its value by 1. If this would result in a zero value, it will be converted to the player's color instead. (b) On a Hexagon of the player's color, this hexagon's value will be increased by the amount spent. This will not influence neighboring hexagons. (c) On a Hexagon of the opposite color, this hexagon's value will be decreased by the amount spent. If the result is negative, the hexagon is converted to the player's color. In this case, the move will influence neighboring hexagon as if it was empty. The game is over when: (a) No empty hexagons are left. (b) 60 Rounds are played. (whatever comes first)\n\n Have fun!

Mit der «SRF Meteo App» sind Sie immer auf dem Laufenden über das Wetter in der Schweiz und weltweit. Informieren Sie sich schnell und einfach über das Wetter an Ihren Lieblingsorten und vergleichen Sie die zugehörigen Prognosen auf einen Blick in der Favoritenübersicht. Das Niederschlagsradar zeigt Ihnen die Entwicklung der letzten sowie der kommenden Stunde. Bei Wetterextremen an Ihren bevorzugten Schweizer Orten werden Sie per Pushmeldungen und direkt in der App mithilfe der Wetterwarnungen gewarnt. Artikel der SRF Meteo-Redaktion sowie Infos zum SRF Meteo-Team bieten Ihnen einen vertieften Einblick in die Themen Wetter und SRF Meteo. Zusammenfassung: - Alle relevanten Wetterinformationen schnell auf einen Blick - Prognose + Wetterbericht für die Schweiz - Lokalprognosen für nationale und internationale Orte - Niederschlagsradar (Messung + Prognose) - Interaktive und zoombare Wetterkarten - Wetterwarnungen per Push-Meldung - Favoriten verwalten und vergleichen - SRF Meteo News - Infos zum SRF Meteo-Team Für Feedback oder bei Problemen mit der SRF Meteo App wenden Sie sich bitte an den SRF Kundendienst per Mail ( srf@srf.ch ) oder per Telefon (0848 80 80 80). With the "SRF Meteo App" They're always up to date on the weather in Switzerland and worldwide. Find out quickly and easily about the weather at your favorite places and compare the associated forecasts at a glance in the Favorites list. The precipitation radar shows you the development of the last and the next hour. In extreme weather conditions at your favorite Swiss places you will be alerted via push notifications and directly into the app using the weather warnings. Article of the SRF Meteo-editors and information about the SRF Meteo-team offer a deeper insight into the issues of weather and SRF Meteo. Executive Summary: - All relevant weather information quickly at a glance - Forecast + Weather for Switzerland - Local forecasts for national and international locations - Precipitation radar (measurement + forecast) - Interactive and zoomable weather maps - Weather alerts via push notification - Manage favorites and compare - SRF Meteo News - Information about the SRF Meteo-Team For feedback or problems with the SRF Meteo app, please contact the SRF customer service by email ( srf@srf.ch ) or by phone (0848 80 80 80).

description: Build unique machines - from simple gearboxes to complex clockworks! Space is scarce - avoid redundant cogs in the wheel! Stack multiple gears and take the genre to a whole new level! Groovy Gears is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. Your task is to arrange gears of different size in order to make all output shafts rotate at the correct speed. Unlike other gear-based games, Groovy Gears allows you to stack multiple gears on top of each other, opening up a plethora of new possibilities. The game features 75 levels with increasing degree of difficulty. While the first levels will get you going quickly, a good deal of logical thought is required in the later stages. But don't worry: If you ever get stuck, you can simply skip a level.

My Android applications will now be supported by a "pay what you want" system. You can choose your price US$1 - US$50 in US$1 increments. The first app that will be migrated to this system will be Octave, followed by others. While this may be disappointing for some, I have realized that giving this work away free (as in $) doesn't serve your or my interests well. It is clear from users that they love what I have done, but want more features and better support. It bothers me significantly that I am not able to provide it because of time and money constraints. This will not be about making a lot of money, this will simply be about creating a better project by paying for developer time going forward. By the way, if you have paid previously via the Play Store for any of my apps, no additional charge is required. Also, paying one amount will cover your usage of all of my apps, which will all adopt the same payment system. How money is spent (after Google gets their cut): 10% (or more): Donated to Free or Open projects that my works is dependent on. 10% (or more): To the Lord's work (humanitarian work). Remaining: Developer time There is pretty much 0 overhead for the work I do.

Play "Four In A Line" online with players all over the world or play offline with machine AI. "Four in a Line" is a two-player game in which the players first choose a color and then take turns dropping their colored discs from the top into vertically-suspended grid. The pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within the column. The object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before one's opponent can do so. There are two variations on the board size, the most commonly used being 7x6, the other being 9x7. It has a strong AI engine when play offline, there are 7 difficulty levels in total. In online play mode ELO rating system is used to calculate the relative skill levels of players.

Mahjongg Solitaire, also called Taipei or Shanghai, is an old chinese board game. The objective is to remove all 144 tiles from the board. There are six kinds of layer suit for play on phone device. The rules are simple: Starting from the sides, or from the central tile at the top of the pile, remove tiles by clicking on two equal symbols. If the tiles are identical, they will disappear. Removeable tiles always must be free on their left or right side. If a tile sits between two tiles on the same level, it cannot be selected.

Play Checkers online with players all over the world, or play with machine AI of 5 difficulty levels. Plays according to American Checkers/English Draughts rules. The strength of AI is very strong, worth you to spend hours on it. There are lots of players online waiting for you at any time. Checkers (also known as draughts) is a board game played on an eight by eight squared board with twelve pieces on each side. These pieces may only initially move and capture diagonally forwards. Only when a piece is "crowned" or "kinged" may it move both backwards or forwards. Players take turns making moves, the blue one always making the first move. To win, you must capture all of your opponent's checkers or block them so that they cannot move.

SameHexagon is a new version of classic SameGame, the tiles are now hexagons. The objective of game is to clear out all of the tiles and score the maximum number of points along the way. You remove groups of tiles that have the same color by tapping on them. You can only remove groups of two or more tiles that are connected to each other. When you remove a group, any tiles above them fall down to fill in the gaps. When you clear out an entire vertical column, the other columns shuffle left to fill in the gap. The more tiles you remove in one tap, the more you score. In general, removing N tiles in one tap scores (N-2) x (N-2) points. When there are no more groups of two or more tiles left, the game is over.

developer: Modern Mobile Digital Media Company Limited
description: 《彭博商業週刊/中文版》Android版是專為移動智能手機量身定制的客戶端，最獨家的政商牛人訪談、最深度的公司調查、最權威的商業趨勢解讀，一切盡在“掌中”。 為甚麼選擇《彭博商業週刊/中文版》Android版： 1.提供最國際化、最啓發商業靈感、最有趣的商業報道——《彭博商業週刊/中文版》（Bloomberg Businessweek）是為中國商業精英量身定制的國際商業週刊，借助彭博社遍布在全球72個國家的2300多名新聞和多媒體專業人員，以及一流本土採編團隊,提供富有洞見的原創商業報道及分析，助你在全球範圍內更好地把握商業機遇。 2.沿襲了iPhone版的全部優秀基因——憑借優質獨特的內容、良好的閱讀體驗，《彭博商業週刊/中文版》在眾多報刊雜誌的App中脫穎而出，入選蘋果中國區“App Store 2012年度精選”。並在第三方機構針對外媒外刊所做的中文版app用戶體驗的橫向評測中，《彭博商業週刊/中文版》更是擊敗了所有競爭對手，勇奪第一。

Brain Training for Android Come on and training your brain. 1.Numbers Tap the numbers, small to large 2.Math symbols Select the correct math symbol 3.Colors Select the text color 4.Figures Find the figure which is in different pattern from the others 5.Cards Tap the cards appeared, from left to right 6.Library Find out the desired book,Fetch the right book from shelf 7.Routes To help the dog find his way home,The puppy changes its direction at every junction 8.Blocks How many blocks? 9.Pairing Tap the pair of same pictures 10.Most appeared Find the picture appeared most often 11.Lightest To find the lightest animal 12.Matching Recall the number of screen patterns 13.Sum up Sum up all the number on the left screen Try it, fun it, make your brain more younger.

description: The Arabian Desert is full of mysterious treasures that are yours for the taking. Uncover the mysteries of the Arabia, legend by legend. Match 3 tiles in a row to remove them from the grid. Collect special objects by removing the tiles beneath and letting them fall to the bottom. Clear all the special objects to finish the level, then claim your riches! Swap to match 3 or more tiles in a row.Eject all items from the bottom of the plahying field to complete each level. Match three or more tiles to reveal the picture hidden behind the game field.

Ghost's Revenge! [ The story ] The little girl was knocked down by a flying car in the village, and the driver escaped with the car. The girl was very serious and finally gone away. The ghost of the girl waked up, and she decied to follow that bay guy.She got in the carwhere the bad guys were drinking. They were not aware of the Revenge. The ghost gathered many fellows, dicussing the revenge……The ghost ask for Dryad’s help. Those bad guys were terribly frightened by the dryads,so they escaped from the woods. The police found them and brought them into justice. Ghost's Revenge finished, she fly away and the village return peaceful. [ How to play ? ] Looking difference between the 2 pictures! The differences between the pictures are very slight in every points of the game. You should find a difference and click the different point in any picture. You can chose ‘play with hints’ firstly. [The features] The pictures are extremely fine,each pair of pictures are almost identical and perfect. There are only slight differences between two pictures,such as the socks of the characters,color of the hairs, watchband of the hands,points of the trees,color of house even far away. Including the feet,shoes, the grass direction even the hair direction.

Pop over to India for a mysterious elephant safari... Shoot to pop matching clusters of 3 or more balls from the string. Get rid of 'em before they reach the end of the string...or it's game over! Inspiration for this game comes from the Flappy bird How to play: - The fish is so fat that can't swim by itself, touch the screen to help it. - Keep fish in water neither the steel mesh nor sand; - Let the fish pass the gap between the steel mesh; - As many points as you can get . - NOTE: If you can't pass any steel mesh, the fish will die and will laught at you! Enjoy yourself!

中國區Top3！ ！ ！ 台灣區連續排行第一的遊戲！ ！ ！ 高品質熱血空戰街機遊戲重磅出擊！雷電 200% 進化新作！高清畫質+3D建模+重量級BOSS！ 微信打飛機打得無聊了吧~來試試經典的飛機大戰——《雷電2012：金屬咆哮》吧，正宗打飛機，正宗射擊快感，打飛機的粉絲們，千萬不要錯過哦~ 遊戲介紹 西元2012年，來自塞伯坦星球的掠奪者盯上了美麗而富饒的地球！邪惡統帥派出蝗蟲般的戰機攻擊地球各大城市。為了保護奈以生存的藍色星球，地球聯盟前所未有的團結，將諾亞方舟改造成最強戰機“雷霆之怒”！ 高科技的裝備隨意搭配，讓你打造只屬於自己的雷電戰機！ 《雷電2012：金屬咆哮》超越經典！ --雷神壁壘：納米材料雷神壁壘，肉眼可見的電磁盾可抵禦攻擊。 1級可以抵禦500 傷害，升到最高4 級時可抵禦2000 傷害； --熾天使之翼：新型武器熾天使衛星，發射紅色火焰，升級後，衛星還可增加至三倍火力； --特洛伊戰甲：隕石合金護甲，提高抗打擊能力，升至最高級後，血槽增加至五格，HP增加為500 點； --戰斧導彈：巡航導彈，具備自動跟踪功能！升級後，裝配戰斧四枚，傷害40 X 4 ； --雅典娜之盾：粒子科技雅典娜之盾，可吸收子彈，升級後，前後方全部配備，人擋殺人，佛擋殺佛。 遊戲特色 重重關卡，挑戰極限，雷神壁壘、熾天使之翼、特洛伊戰甲、戰斧、雅典娜等高科技裝備 讓你耳目一新 3D畫面，如臨其境，一場場暢快淋漓的戰鬥 前無僅有，最動感的音樂最扣人心弦的出擊 最勇敢的英雄，最刺激的空戰，最悲壯的史詩，在浩劫中保衛家園，在絕望中體驗希望，絕世經典，不容錯過。 KooGame更多遊戲 ----------------------- 狂斬三國 三國大富翁 小魚大營救 -----------------------

An intelligent app for task management. When the app is launched, it will automatically recommend useless apps, and retain useful apps. Simply with one touch, you can let the phone run faster, while not affecting its normal functions. Different from other task killers, this app will not always stay on the notice bar,it only appears to remind you when memory is running low or depending on your phone status. You can also select to turn the reminder on notice bar on or off by going to the "settings" of the menu. This app has 2 modes: normal mode and entertainment mode. If you like to play games or take photos, you can select entertainment mode. Easier to use.

description: This is an interesting lock screen app for FREE. Different from other lock apps on the market, in addition to the traditional lock-screen functions, you can use this app to tease your friends. This app has a special unlock. The main interface displayed on the screen is the traditional sliding unlock way which will mislead people. Without acknowledge, when your friend try to unlock your screen, there will randomly come out a horror, spoof or funny picture or a animation to tease them, your friends will surely be frightened that brings utter amusement to you. * Correct unlock way: The cross unlock way on the main interface is fake, if you use it to unlock, it will pop up 4 kinds of animation to tease people, and then it will return to the lock screen. Drag the "SMS" icon at the bottom of the screen into the "phone" icon to really unlock the lock screen. Do not forget it! Otherwise, you won't unlock yourself! * Friendly Reminder: Horror animation is full of terror. Do not tease people who have heart disease. Software features: * Lock screen * Fake unlock * Real unlock * 4 animations for teasing people * Vibration * Automatic lock screen Your comments and opinions are highly appreciated, please review our apps on market or contact us by Email.

description: Hongkong Metro

有人说，人生至少应该有两次冲动，一次是为了奋不顾身的爱情，一次是为了说走就走的旅行。然而，若是能用说走就走的旅行，来印证彼此奋不顾身的爱情，这，才是一种完满吧。 台湾很小，台湾也很大，从城市到乡村，高山到大海，峡谷到湖潭，每个地方都散发着不同的风情，值得细细品味。享受台北，品味台南，领略高雄，漫步垦丁。一杯咖啡一本书，在多雨多雾多梦想的空中之城九份，慵懒一个悠闲的下午；饶富趣味的巷弄美食和地道小吃挑逗着味蕾，身为一个吃货在这里是如此的幸福；在诚品，发呆惬意两相宜，和书籍一起贩售的，还有生活方式。看过你许多的电影，像是走过了许多段的人生，你用画面讲述故事，用音乐点燃内心的情感，恋恋台湾，也许每个人心中都藏了一份，有关台湾的，浪漫而偏执的梦。如果可以，我不想匆匆。 Zn攻略： 提供最佳的旅行攻略，请多多支持 kw:有人说，人生至少应该有两次冲动，一次是为了奋不顾身的爱情，一次是为了说走就走的旅行。然而，若是能用说走就走的旅行 ，来印证彼此奋不顾身的爱情，这，才是一种完满吧。 台湾很小，台湾也很大，从城市到乡村，高山到大海，峡谷到湖潭，每个地方都散发着不同的风情，值得细细品味。享受台北， 品味台南，领略高雄，漫步垦丁。一杯咖啡一本书，在多雨多雾多梦想的空中之城九份，慵懒一个悠闲的下午；饶富趣味的巷弄 美食和地道小吃挑逗着味蕾，身为一个吃货在这里是如此的幸福；在诚品，发呆惬意两相宜，和书籍一起贩售的，还有生活方式 。看过你许多的电影，像是走过了许多段的人生，你用画面讲述故事，用音乐点燃内心的情感，恋恋台湾，也许每个人心中都藏 了一份，有关台湾的，浪漫而偏执的梦。如果可以，我不想匆匆。 Zn攻略： 提供最佳的旅行攻略，请多多支持 kw:攻略 旅行 旅游 台湾 宝岛 高雄 台北

StackO - A Scrabble-like Word Game of Skill, Strategy and Speed StackO is a unique, smooth, quirky, and intelligent word game which is capturing the imagination of Android gamers. If nothing, it will definitely improve your vocabulary. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook for daily user picks and other interesting features: Twitter: http://twitter.com/stackogame Facebook: http://facebook.com/stackogame **************************************************** WHAT IS StackO ABOUT? Given limited stacks of letters, you have to strategically make words to maximize your game score within a limited time. The games can be played in either easy, medium or hard mode. You can challenge your facebook friends and other random opponents for Head to Head games. Each head to head game consists of 1 round and can be played whenever you've time. Tap on the letter tiles on a game board to make valid words containing at least 3 letters. With special tiles, bonuses for long words and penalties for 3 letter words, the game is about using the tiles in the most judicious way to maximize your score. Board Clearance Bonus, Extra Tiles and Time Remaining Bonus add an extra element of fun and strategy to the game. Unlock achievements and brag about them on Twitter and Facebook. Can you outscore others?

SessionChat Android Edition is a SIP Phone for your Android OS device. PLEASE NOTE THIS IS THE TRIAL VERSION OF SESSIONTALK AND HAS A ONE MINUTE TIME LIMIT ON CALLS. If you like it please consider upgrading to full version. Use your favorite VoIP provider as the softphone is not tied to any particular one. Not used VoIP? Sign up for free with a number of SIP compliant providers worldwide and make VoIP to VoIP calls free anywhere in the world. Save money on international calls. On the move? With SessionChat Android you can make SIP VoIP calls wherever you have a 3G connection. Please note some mobile network operators prohibit or restrict the use of VoIP over their networks and may impose additional fees or other charges. Please check with your operator before making calls over 3G. SessionChat Android features: ★ Supports making VoIP calls over 3G and WiFi ★ Background support - receive calls whilst the app is in the background, switch between apps and stay on the call. ★ Multiple accounts - simultaneously registered. Receive calls on any registered account. ★ Set call background image to contact photo or custom image ★ Dial Plan ★ Dual Line ★ Swap between 2 active calls ★ Conference - Merge and Split ★ Attended and Unattended Transfer ★ TLS Encryption with optional certificate verification ★ SRTP secure calls ★ Call Recording ★ Bluetooth Support ★ Quick import of accounts from major VoIP providers ★ Excellent audio quality ★ G722, G711 ,GSM and iLBC codec support ★ Speakerphone, Mute and Hold ★ DTMF Support , RFC2833 and Inband ★ SIP Proxy support ★ Automatic service discovery using DNS SRV queries ★ STUN server support ★ Global IP ★ Ringtones ★ Contacts integration, add or edit contacts from within the app ★ Detailed Call history ★ Dial from Call History and Favorites ★ Voicemail Notifications *IMPORTANT SIP PROVIDER OR SIP PBX SERVER REQUIRED. SessionChat Android Edition is a SIP VoIP Phone not a service. You must use SessionChat with a SIP compliant VoIP provider or SIP PBX (server) to use this softphone product. Please contact your service provider or IT helpdesk for more information. Check out our website for further info sessiontalk.co.uk. If you need technical support please email support@sessiontalk.co.uk

The perfect app to ride the streets of Tel-Aviv using the city shared bike service, Tel-O-Fun. Enter origin and destination, and we will find the fastest routes. Information on available bikes in the stations are updated in real-time from the city service. So ride safe, and wear a helmet.
release_text: Show stations around me. Show current location on map screen. Small enhancements and bug fixes

description: New good night's app to the "Sleepy Boyfriend" series for all the otome-girls around the world! Soine Hitsuji -Kaname Ver.- ===================================== This app is meant for your good nights enjoyment. *Using headphones or earphones is recommended for more realistic experience. ===================================== - Character info Name: Kaname Voice: Hiro Shimono Age: 17 Occupation: High-school 2nd year Personality: Diplomatic, has many friends, helps people Sample phrases: "I might do something more lover-like..." "Don't say my warmth feels good so easily..." "Don't stare at me! Stop it!!" Cover illustration is made by Yone Kazuki! - Characters series Vol.1：Ryuutarou Okiayu Vol.2：Keiji Fujiwara Vol.3: Daisuke Kishio Vol.4: Hiro Shimono - Features By tapping a character in the top view you get to "Talk-mode". By tapping the Talk-button the character will say something. *The free version of the app contains 10 different phrases. The alarm can be set from the settings. After setting the alarm please be sure to leave the app running in talk-mode or sheep counting-mode. In "Counting sheep-mode" the character will sing the sheep counting song! *In free version the character will count to 10. Additional phrases can be purchased in the "Hitsuji-ya" shop. A special microphone was used during the recording to give a more realistic experience. We recommend using headphones. *IMPORTANT The alarm feature can not be used in iPhone's sleep mode. When using the alarm the app needs to be left on. It is recommended to use a power adapter. - About "Soine Hitsuji CD" "Soine Hitsuji CD" is a collaborative release from honeybee label's "Hitsuji de oyasumi series" and BlackButterfly's "Shuukan Soine CD series". Your wonderful boyfriend will count sheep with you before falling asleep! Official site http://www.blackbutterfly-cd.com/short/ Twitter http://twitter.com/soine_kareshi

app_name: 耳年齢診断アプリ　＜補聴器販売店検索機能付き＞
description: 耳年齢って気になりませんか？ 「耳年齢アプリ」は、デンマークの補聴器メーカーワイデックスが提供する、モスキート音（高周波）を使った簡単な耳年齢チェックができる無料アプリです。その他にも補聴器販売店を検索できる機能もあります。 画面の中の動き回るひよこをタッチしてさっそくチェックしてみましょう。 使い方はかんたん 画面の中を動き回るひよこをタッチするすると、今度は一列に並んだひよこが出てきます。次にそれぞれのひよこをタッチすると、各年代の平均的な聴力にあわせて音がでます。高い年代から聞いていき、聞こえるところまでがあなたの耳年齢ということになります。 主な機能 耳年齢チェック 補聴器販売店検索 ご注意ください チェックの結果は、あくまでも目安となります。聴力の低下が疑わる場合や、気になる場合には、すぐに耳鼻科の専門医に相談することをおすすめします。 ワイデックスホームページ 難聴と補聴器の総合サイト「みみから。」　 http://www.widexjp.co.jp/ Do not mind me ear age? "Ears age app" is a free app that can be a hearing aid manufacturer Widex of Denmark has to offer, a simple ear age check using mosquito sound (high frequency). There is also a feature that allows you to search a hearing aid dealer also other. Let's check immediately by touching the chicks move around the middle of the screen. Easy to use When you touch the chicks move around in the screen, chick lined up in a row will come out this time. The next time you touch the chick each, the sound will appear to fit the hearing the average of each age. It will hear from high age, to the point where you hear will be that age your ear. Main function Ear age check Hearing aid dealer search Please note The results of the check, it becomes the aim to the last. And Utagawaru case, if you are worried about, hearing loss is recommended that you consult a specialist of otolaryngology immediately. Widex Homepage Comprehensive site of hearing aids and hearing loss "Mimikara." Http://www.widexjp.co.jp/

“공룡이 살아있다”는 No.1 “곤충이 살아있다”와 더불어 살아있다 시리즈의 두번째 시리즈로써 3D 가상체험을 통하여 스마트 학습을 효과적으로 누릴수 있도록 설계 되었습니다. ★ "공룡이 살아있다"는 유아(6개월 이후)부터 초등학생과 중학생등 학습 진도에 맞춰진 공룡 학습 교육 앱(App)입니다. 또한 학부모님을 포함한 유치원 선생님과 초등 및 중학교 선생님께서 유아 및 학생들에게 가상의 관찰 학습을 도와줄 수 있도록 제작되었습니다. ★ "공룡이 살아있다"는 3D를 활용하여 공룡을 여러 방향에서 볼 수 있습니다. 보다 현실감있는 공룡들을 가상 체험하고 학습할 수 있도록 설계 되었습니다. ★ 반복되는 학습 효과와 생동감 있는 3D 콘텐츠로 인하여 유아에게는 말트임 현상과 사물 인지와 창의력을 높여주며, 기본적인 색깔 구별을 실현토록 제작되었으며, 초등 및 중학생들에게는 현실감 있는 효과음과 동일한 연령층의 성우 나레이션을 통하여 학습효과를 높여줍니다.(업데이트 버전에 적용) <"공룡이 살아있다"의 주요 기능> ✓ 총 26종의 범용적인 공룡들을 3D로 표현했으며, 공룡 보기화면으로 들어가면 식성(초식 및 육식)구분, 시대구분, 크기구분(대,중,소), 최초 발견지 및 서식지 정보등을 한눈으로 볼 수 있도록 설계 되었습니다. ※ 공룡 크기구분 (대: 10m 이상, 중: 5~10m, 소: 1~5m) ※ 공룡 시대구분 : 쥐라기 중기는 앱 표현상 쥐라기 전기로 표시됨 ※ 26마리의 공룡을 모두 체험하시려면 표지화면에서 “➪” 다음화면으로 클릭하세요 ✓ 3D 가상체험과 함께 반복적인 학습효과를 위하여 공룡이름, 공룡 별명, 공룡이 살았던 시기등을 반복하여 볼 수 있으며, 현미경 버튼을 누르시면 공룡들의 주요 특징등 각 공룡들의 자세한 정보가 설명되어 있습니다. ✓ 3D 가상체험의 특성을 고려하여 모든 공룡은 3D로 표현되어 터치시마다 애니메이션이 3개 동작으로 구분되어 흥미를 더욱더 느낄수 있도록 제작되어 있습니다. ✓ 각 화면은 터치를 할때마다 공룡의 크기가 사용자가 보기 쉽도록 확대 및 축소해서 보실수 있어 인터랙티브한 공룡을 체험 하실 수 있습니다. ✓ OX 스피드 퀴즈 : 앱(App)에서 체험한 정보들을 활용해 각 공룡들의 OX 스피드 퀴즈를 풀 수 있으며 자연스럽게 학습을 유도합니다. 60초에 몇개의 문제를 맞출 수 있는지 확인해 보세요. ✓ 그림 퀴즈 : 앱(App)에서 체험한 정보들을 활용해 각 공룡들의 특징을 파악하고 분석하면서 자연스럽게 학습을 유도합니다. 공룡들의 특성을 파악해 보세요. ✓ 색칠하기 : 26종 각 공룡들을 알록달록 색칠할 수 있는 프로그램입니다. 해당 공룡들을 이쁘게 색칠해봅시다. 휴대폰 기능에 있는 스크린캡쳐를 하고 친구들과 부모님들께 자랑해보세요. ★ 갖가지 특징을 가지고 있는 26종의 공룡들을 만나봅시다! ★ 이 콘텐츠는 “안드로이드4.0” “아이스크림 샌드위치”이상 버젼에 최적화 되어 있습니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : +82-2-2038-8377 서울특별시 마포구 매봉산로 18 마포창업복지관 403호 (주)뷰아이디어 403ho,18 Maebongsan-ro,Mapo Business Center,Mapo-ku,Seoul,Korea Is alive, Series No.2 - "dinosaur is alive _3D> Insects are alive "and" living dinosaur "the No.1 live with the second series of the series as a 3D virtual experience through smart learning is designed to receive, ★ "living dinosaur." description: Galaxy Fart is a special version of "Who Farted" dedicated to all the users having a phone from the Samsung Galaxy series. Who Farted? Take a ride in Awad's car around the city of Amman and collect orders from restaurants and deliver it to the right place before the time run out Upgrade your car and unlock multiple restaurants to make more & more deliveries! The game features: 1 - Unique 3D Graphics 2 - Funny characters 3 - Multiple up-gradable cars 4 - Large map and open world Download and rate the game TODAY Free for ever! Print Text Messages is the simplest way to transfer SMS messages from your phone to a computer for printing. Simply select the contact you wish to print text messages from and the app will collate all the SMS messages from your device into a printable list. You can then export the copied SMS messages into your chosen app or web service or you can choose to email the text messages using your email client or GMail. Print Text Messages supports a variety of web services such as Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, Adobe PDF and many others. You can quickly and easily export your text messages using any installed service you have. Print Text Messages is useful if you need to print SMS messages for business or if you need to show evidence of an ex sending your threatening or abusive text messages. If someone is sending you abusive SMS messages simply select them from the contact list and email the text messages to your lawyer or print out the text messages to present to a law enforcement agency. We offer a full money back guarantee if this app does not enable you to print your text messages directly from your phone. Contact us from the link in the app with your device details if you have any problems. You can also try out our limited free version before choosing to upgrade.

A key resource for junior doctors and non-renal specialists treating AKI, the app has been endorsed by the Renal Association, the Royal College of Physicians (London), and the Society for Acute Medicine. The Jungle Book (1894) is a collection of stories by English Nobel laureate Rudyard Kipling. The stories were first published in magazines in 1893–94. The original publications contain illustrations, some by Rudyard's father, John Lockwood Kipling. Kipling was born in India and spent the first six years of his childhood there. After about ten years in England, he went back to India and worked there for about six-and-half years. These stories were written when Kipling lived in Vermont. The tales in the book are fables, using animals in an anthropomorphic manner to give moral lessons. The verses of The Law of the Jungle, for example, lay down rules for the safety of individuals, families and communities. Kipling put in them nearly everything he knew or "heard or dreamed about the Indian jungle." Other readers have interpreted the work as allegories of the politics and society of the time. The best-known of them are the three stories revolving around the adventures of an abandoned "man cub" Mowgli who is raised by wolves in the Indian jungle. The most famous of the other stories are probably "Rikki-Tikki-Tavi", the story of a heroic mongoose, and "Toomai of the Elephants", the tale of a young elephant-handler. As with much of Kipling's work, each of the stories is preceded by a piece of verse, and succeeded by another. The Jungle Book, because of its moral tone, came to be used as a motivational book by the Cub Scouts, a junior element of the Scouting movement. Akela, the head wolf in The Jungle Book, has become a senior figure in the movement, the name being traditionally adopted by the leader of each Cub Scout pack. Demo version of AlfaOBD software for Alfa-Romeo, Fiat, Lancia. Some Dodge, RAM, and Chrysler models produced in cooperation with Fiat are covered. Although the software is primarily targeted for car owners, it provides the features of professional scanners. Many dealer-level diagnostic and configuration procedures are available in the full version. NOTE: if your Android device is not in the list of compatible devices on Google Play and you cannot install or upgrade your installation please contact info@alfaobd.com . Make sure you have a compatible OBD interface. For the list of supported OBD interfaces see www.alfaobd.com. NOTE: If AlfaOBD can not connect to a car ECU with the message "Interface reports NO DATA" or "Interface reports CAN ERROR" it most probably means your interface is not compatible or defective. For the details of configuration of connection to interface and car see application help available on http://www.alfaobd.com/AlfaOBD_Android_Help.pdf AlfaOBD features include: - native support of Electronic control units used in Fiat group cars. Native support differs AlfaOBD from many other diagnostic applications providing only limited generic OBDII support of Fiat group cars. - monitoring various dynamic parameters of engine, gearbox, ABS, climate control ECUs and graphical presentation as plots - reading of static data: ECU identification, system status, fault codes with probable causes and environment information where applicable - clearing of fault codes - (Full version only) active diagnostics and configuration procedures for various equipment controlled by engine, gearbox, body computer, climate control, ABS, airbag, code control and other ECUs - (Full version only) electronic key and RF remote control programming AlfaOBD supports ELM327 and OBDKey Bluetooth interfaces on all Bluetooth-enabled Android devices and ELM327/OBDKey WLAN interfaces on rooted devices only. For details of configuration of connection to interface and car see application help. Application available in Czech, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, and Spanish. Languages are selectable via Setting. The limitations of the demo version are: - Application run time limit of 15 minutes. Application reverts back to the first screen after 15 minutes of connection to a control unit. - No active diagnostic procedures available - The number of scanned gauges is limited by four - The number of monitored parameters is limited by four All other features are operational. No time limit is imposed on the application. NOTE: Please switch off "Don't keep activities" in "Settings"->"Developer Option" on your Android device. If plots are not updated, turn "Force GPU rendering" off in "Settings"->"Developer Option".
release_text: Updates for CNG/LPG engines on Alfa Mito/Giulietta, Fiat Panda/Punto Evo/Fiorino/Qubo, Lancia Ypsilon. Support for Ducato 2014. Update for Fiat Ottimo/Viaggio, Dodge Dart.

description: Di3rT: “Those games forced me to train my Mario Party skills before encountering my friends again.” Amanda: “I played it at the party and was involved to it so much, that haven’t eaten or drink anything for 30 minutes” Brad: “I played it with my kids once. Now they are constantly playing. I am hearing tunes from the games and unconsciously hum them during work.” Are your kids getting bored in the restaurant? Is your party going to flop? Are your co-workers out of ideas how to spend another day at work? Do you miss your Mario Party experience? Are You looking for nonviolent games, perfect for children? You have found the perfect solution! Place your device on the table and start competing in many addictive mini-games which will instantly bring Mario Party memories. Each of the games can be played by party up to 4 players or with AI. You can play game for just 1 minute or all evening. The games are quick and funny and you can finish them any time and announce the winner. In addition each game requires different skills and each player has a chance to win, irrelevant of age, good reflex or knowledge. It is the perfect, nonviolent entertainment for everybody from 4 to 99 years of age. Imagine, it is so easy to have fun with our party Games. We have created 8 great, Mario Party inspired, mini-games in this version. For each game we have composed unique, matching music and we have recorded it using real instruments from all over the world. Start the game, turn the disk on the main screen and listen to the magical soundtrack. Please send your comments, suggestions and what games you would like to play. We are the aliens and we create games we would like to play ourselves. Play the game, Mario would be proud of!
